zh-CN: 2010年到2014年3月腾讯或者新浪微博中的英中平行语料库。
en-US: the english - chinese parallel corpus in the domain of twitter of tencent or sina twitter from 2010 to march 2014 .

zh-CN: 大家好！这是我的腾讯官方微博！现在大家可以收听我，我在中国期间大家可以给我发信息哦！谢谢大家的支持！大卫-贝克汉姆
en-US: hi everyone , this is my official tencent page , now you can follow and send me a message while i am in china ! thanks for all your support. david x

zh-CN: 在杭州一家漂亮的酒店休息，西湖的景色美极了！
en-US: just relaxing at the beautiful hotel in hangzhou . west lake is stunning .

zh-CN: 在杭州绿城医院遇到了不可思议的孩子们和工作人员。
en-US: met the incredible children and staff at greentown hospital in hangzhou .

zh-CN: 在北京一家饺子餐馆吃了一顿丰盛晚餐。
en-US: i had a great meal at a local beijing restaurant called boayuan dumplings .

zh-CN: 真正的朋友会在整个世界都离你远去的时候，仍然与你并肩。
en-US: a real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out .

zh-CN: 判断一个人，不听言语看行动。
en-US: we can't judge a person by what he says but by what he does .

zh-CN: 一个人被打败不算完蛋，当他放弃就真正完蛋了。
en-US: a man is not finished when he is defeated . he is finished when he quits .

zh-CN: 一名粉丝在我上台前给了我这条手链，这是她用橡皮带为我做的。
en-US: a fan gave me this bracelet right before i went on stage. she made it for me outta rubber bands .

zh-CN: 我的巴士司机很爱我...HelloKitty浴室防滑垫、毛巾和肥皂。真爱！谢谢...
en-US: my bus driver loves me... hello kitty bath mat , towels and soap. true love ! than..

zh-CN: 来看看我最新的巡演礼品吧！！哪一件是你的最爱呢？！
en-US: heck out my new tour merch ! ! which piece is your favorite ? !

zh-CN: 刚刚签好的。出发前往今晚演出和粉丝见面会的地点啦。
en-US: freshly signed . off to the venue for tonights show and meet and greet .

zh-CN: 非常感谢我了不起的粉丝们，很高兴你们都喜欢我的新专辑！
en-US: thank you so much to all of my amazing fans. im so glad you guys are enjoying the new album !

zh-CN: 只有很少的人懂得，人生是因为缺憾而美丽。所谓的回头，只不过是丢掉了白天的太阳之后，又错过了夜晚的星星。
en-US: only few people know that life is beautiful for lacking something. theso-called turning-around is that you not only miss the sun in day timebut also the stars at night .

zh-CN: 歌唱吧！就像没人在听。爱吧！就像你从来没有被伤害过。纵情跳舞吧！就像没人在看。好好生活吧！就像居住在天堂一样。
en-US: sing like no one ； love never been hurt , dance like nobody's watching , and live like its heaven on earth .

zh-CN: 只有一个人能界定你一生的成就，那就是你自己。
en-US: there is only one person who can define success in your life - and that's you .

zh-CN: 如今，也许我永远见不到的这个人，却让我想全心全意去爱他。
en-US: in the meantime the one man maybe i can never meet , i would like to give my whole heart to 。

zh-CN: 怀念是生命中最无能为力的事情，并且卑微。
en-US: fondly remembers is in the life the most helpless matter , and is base and low .

zh-CN: 当有人说你变了的时候，不过是因为你不再按他们习惯的方式生活罢了。
en-US: when someone says you have changed , but because you no longer according to their way of life habit stopped .

zh-CN: 当你在高处的时候，你的朋友知道你是谁；当你坠落的时候，你才知道你的朋友是谁。
en-US: when you ' re up your friends know who you are , but when you ' re down , you know your friends are !

zh-CN: 心中的伤痛总是不知不觉渐渐愈合，虽然我们也曾痛苦地发誓说永不忘记。
en-US: there is an unconscious heeling process within the mind which mends up in spite of our desperate determination never to forget .

zh-CN: 生活就像是跟老天对弈，对你而言，你走棋，那叫选择；老天走棋，那叫挑战。
en-US: life is like playing chess with god.your moves are called choices ; his moves are called challenges .

zh-CN: 如果你觉得自己的生活不如人意，想想世界上有多少人过得比你更悲惨吧！
en-US: when you think your life sucks , just think to yourself about how many people have it worse .

zh-CN: 做一个世界的水手，游遍所有的港口。
en-US: to be a sailor of the world , bound for all ports .

zh-CN: 如果你在认识某某前很快乐，那在他们离开后你也可以很快乐。
en-US: if you were happy before you knew someone , you can be happy after they're gone .

zh-CN: 时间不是让人忘了痛,而是让人习惯了痛。
en-US: time won't ease your pain but let you get used to it 。

zh-CN: 我们都有点怪，生活也有点怪。当发现某人的怪与我们的兼容，于是联合成共同的怪，并称之为爱。
en-US: we are all a little weird and life ’ s a little weird , and when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours , we join up with them and fall in mutual weirdness and call it love .

zh-CN: 男人们可能终日欢场潇洒，可是在临睡前，脑子里萦绕的始终是他真正在乎的那个女子。
en-US: guys may be flirting around all day but before they go to sleep , they always think about the girl they truly care about .

zh-CN: 我想你一次，星星就坠落一颗，当你仰望夜空，星星难觅踪影的时候，你就知道我有多想你！
en-US: every time i miss you , a star falls.so if you ever look up at the sky and the stars are gone , it's because you made me miss you too much !

zh-CN: 每一个女生都应该明白，她们不需要一个不把自己放在第一位的男孩。
en-US: every girl should know that she doesn't need a man who don't need her the first place .

zh-CN: 女孩是男孩的运气，男孩是女孩的命运。一个女孩会给一个男孩带来不一样的运气。
en-US: girl is the boy's luck , the boy is a girl's fate. a girl a boy would bring different luck .

zh-CN: 勿以善小而不为，有时候，你所做的这些小事，会成为他们心中最重要的部分。
en-US: never get tired of doing little things for others. sometimes those things occupy the biggest part of their hearts .

zh-CN: 不要在艰难不合理的环境中消沉，也不要高声呐喊。人们赞赏那些即使流着泪也默默的努力寻求改变的人。
en-US: don't be dejected in hard and irrational conditions , or shout loudly . people approve the man who makes great efforts to seek a change silently even though he shed tears .

zh-CN: 并不是每个人都会欣赏的你的价值，因为有些人是以貌取人的。所以你不必为他们的肤浅埋单。
en-US: not all the people can enjoy your value for someone judges the others by appearance . thus , there is no need for you to pay the cost for their superficiality .

zh-CN: 即使再见面，成熟地表演，不如不见。
en-US: it'd be better we don't meet again because of the skillful acting .

zh-CN: 如果你真的很想要一样东西的话，没有什么能阻止你得到它。
en-US: if you want it badly enough , there are no limits on what you can achieve .

zh-CN: 我们开始相爱不是因为找到了一个完美的人，而是因为学会了完美地看待一个不完美的人。
en-US: we come to love not by finding a perfect person , but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly .

zh-CN: 如果你只为自己奋斗，只有你一个人是赢家；若为婚姻奋斗，夫妻两人都是赢家。
en-US: if you fight for yourself , only you can win ; when you fight for your marriage , you both win .

zh-CN: 是我不该把依赖寄托给触碰不到的未来。
en-US: i should not have to rely on sustenance to the touch than the future .

zh-CN: 也许只有夜晚一床温暖的棉被和一个好梦，才可以慰藉每天有太多不如意的我们。
en-US: sleeping without a dream makes us feel empty.maybe the only way to console us is having a warm quilt and an unknown dream.good night .

zh-CN: 如果他们不能接受最差的你，也不配拥有最好的你。
en-US: if they cannot accept the worst you , also do not deserve the best you .

zh-CN: 你之所以感到孤独，并不是没有人关心你，而是你在乎的那个人没有关心你。
en-US: you feel lonely not when no one cares about you , but when someone you expect to care doesn't care about you at all .

zh-CN: 当你真正喜欢一样东西，但它又常常给你带来伤害的时候，其实这是老天在考验你是否足够坚持。
en-US: when you have something you really love but it causes you pain , god is just testing you to see if you are strong enough to hold it .

zh-CN: 如果想飞得高，就该把地平线忘掉。
en-US: if you want to fly too high in relation to the horizon forget .

zh-CN: 我怀念的不是哪个人，而是我那回不去的曾经。
en-US: not what i miss , but i can not go back the past .

zh-CN: 尽管还不曾离开，我已对你朝思暮想！
en-US: i miss you so much already and i haven ’ t even left yet !

zh-CN: 后悔是一种耗费精神的情绪。后悔是比损失更大的损失，比错误更大的错误。所以不要后悔。
en-US: penitence is something that enervates our spirit , causing a greater loss than the loss itself and making a bigger mistake than the mistake itself. so never regret .

zh-CN: 烈火炼真金，逆境炼壮士。
en-US: the fire is the test of gold ; adversity of strong men .

zh-CN: 如果你想过得快乐，那就把生活和目标结合在一起，而不是来自他人或物质。
en-US: if you want to live a happy life , tie it to a goal. not to people or things .

zh-CN: 脚踏实地，但是，心要像风筝一样飞得高！
en-US: keep your feet on the ground , but let your heart soar as high as a kite !

zh-CN: 上帝既已安排我们相识，怎能不让我们相守！
en-US: i don't understand the god who'd let us meet if we could never be together .

zh-CN: 你们必须努力寻找自己的声音，因为你越迟开始寻找，找到的可能性就越小。
en-US: boys , you must strive to find your own voice. because the longer you wait to begin , the less likely you are to find it at all .

zh-CN: 所有人在醒着的时候都是置身于同一个世界，但在睡着后，却都置身在自己的世界。
en-US: all men whilst they are awake are in one common world ; but each of them , when he is asleep , is in a world of his own .

zh-CN: 对美好的事物感恩很容易。然而，精彩的人生属于那些对挫折也心存感激的人。
en-US: it's easy to be thankful for the good things , while a life of rich fulfillment comes to those who are also thankful for the setbacks 。

zh-CN: 当你快乐的时候你是最美的，所以别一直悲伤着浪费时间了。
en-US: you're prettiest when you ' re happy. don't waste your time being sad .

zh-CN: 学会用理解的，欣赏的眼光去看对方，而不是以自以为是的关心去管对方。
en-US: learn to use the understanding of the vision to see and appreciate each other , in order to opinionated care to pipe each other .

zh-CN: 一次又一次的失望，让我退到无处可退。我真的累了，很累很累。可不可以让我休息一下。
en-US: again and again , let my disappointment withdrew to nowhere to retreat. i'm really tired , tired tired . can let me have a rest .

zh-CN: 不要为那些不愿在你身上花费时间的人而浪费你的时间。不要着急，最好的总会在最不经意的时候出现。
en-US: don ‘ t waste your time on a man/woman , who isn ‘ t willing to waste their time on you . don ‘ t try so hard , the best things come when you least expect them to .

zh-CN: 没有人值得你流泪，值得让你这么做的人不会让你哭泣。
en-US: no man or woman is worth your tears , and the one who is , won ‘ t make you cry .

zh-CN: 锻炼、节制、新鲜空气和必要的休息是最好的医生。
en-US: exercise , temperance , fresh air , and needful rest are the best of all physicians .

zh-CN: 没有人可以回到过去重新开始，但谁都可以从今日开始，书写一个全然不同的结局。
en-US: nobody can go back and then start a new begining , but anyone can start today and make a new ending .

zh-CN: 不要说你爱我，除非你是真心的，因为我可能会傻傻的，就相信你的话了。
en-US: don ’ t say you love me unless you really mean it , because i might do something crazy like believe it .

zh-CN: 万般情感，千种想法，百段回忆，只为一个人。
en-US: a million feelings. a thousand thoughts. a hundred memories. all for one person .

zh-CN: 关于你，我真是从来不需要想起，因为永远都不会忘记。
en-US: about you , i really am always do not need to remember , because forever will not forget .

zh-CN: 不要害怕改变，尽管你可能会因此失去一些好的东西，但你也可能会得到一些更好的东西。
en-US: don ’t be afraid of change , you may lose out on something good , but you might gain something even better !

zh-CN: 等待，不是为了你能回来，而是找个借口不离开。
en-US: waiting , it is not for your return , but instead , for an excuse not to leave .

zh-CN: 女人希望自己的男人是领导者而不是独裁者：坚定却不蛮横，自信却不自负！
en-US: a woman wants a man who is a leader not a dictator , strong but not overbearing , confident but not conceited ！

zh-CN: 用你的笑容去改变这个世界，别让这个世界改变了你的笑容。
en-US: use your smiled to changd the world . don't let the world change your smile .

zh-CN: 不喜欢就不要选择，喜欢了就要坚持。
en-US: don't make the choice if you dislike , once you make the decision , please hold on .

zh-CN: 爱情因一个微笑而发生，因一吻而滋长，最后因一滴泪而终结。
en-US: love starts with a smile , develops with a kiss and ends with a tear .

zh-CN: 爱不是那个会让你伤心难过的人，而是那个总在你身后让你笑起来的人。
en-US: love is not about who hurt you and broke you down , it's about who was always there to make you smile again .

zh-CN: 个人之间的感情就像织毛衣，建立的时候一针一线，小心而漫长，拆除的时候只要轻轻一拉。
en-US: building relationship between individuals is like knitting a sweater . it's established needle by needle carefully and it's time-consuming.but it ‘ d be broken up with only slight pull .

zh-CN: 事实每个人都能了解，理解和执行才是关键。
en-US: facts are available to everyone ; it is interpretation and implementation that is key .

zh-CN: 不摧毁他们的曾经，你就无法改变他们的现在。
en-US: you can't change who people are without destroying who they were .

zh-CN: 如果你无法忍受我最坏的一面，你也不配得到我最好的一面。
en-US: if you can't handle me at my worst , then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best .

zh-CN: 即使你拥有一个富裕的家庭，或是一副强劲的体魄，亦或一颗聪颖的头脑，但想获得真正的成功，依然必须全力以赴。
en-US: even if you are born into a rich family , or with a smart mind or a strong body , you still have to work hard to truly succeed and reach your potential .

zh-CN: 我喜欢天空中那淡淡的云，它将天空衬的更高更蓝更宽……
en-US: l like the subtle flow of cloud that makes the sky seem even more vast , azure and immense...

zh-CN: 不要爱上一个漂亮的人，而要爱上一个使你的生活变漂亮的人。
en-US: don't love the one who is beautiful ， but love the one who can make your life beautiful ．

zh-CN: 哪个没心没肺的人，没有一段为某人掏心掏肺的曾经。
en-US: every careless and inattentive person has his past being careful and attentive for someone .

zh-CN: 两个男人追一个女人，用情浅的那个先放弃；两个女人追一个男人，用情深的那个先放弃。
en-US: two men chasing a woman ， the first used feeling shallow quit ； two women ， chasing a man with the first giving up feeling .

zh-CN: 如果一个目的是正当而必须做的，则达到这个目的的必要手段也是正当而必须采取的。
en-US: when an end is lawful and obligatory , the indispensable means to it are also lawful and obligatory .

zh-CN: 坚持积极、乐观、坚强的心态，它们会令疑虑、恐惧和失败闻风丧胆。
en-US: too positiv to be doubtful , too optimistic to be fearful , and too determined to be defeated .

zh-CN: 想你，是一种美丽的忧伤的甜蜜的惆怅，心里面，却是一种用任何语言也无法表达的温馨。
en-US: it's graceful gref and sweet sadness to thnk of you , but n my heart , there's a kind of soft warmth that can ’ t be expressed with any choice of words .

zh-CN: 我们无法在这个世界上做什么伟大的事情，可我们可以带着伟大的爱做一些小事。
en-US: we cannot do great things on this earth , only small things with great love .

zh-CN: 努力追求赢得你所爱，否则你只能努力去爱你所有。
en-US: do your best to have whatever you love. otherwise , you'll be force to love whatever you have .

zh-CN: 最终，真正重要的不是生命里的岁月，而是岁月中的生活。
en-US: and in the end , it's not the years in your life that count. it's the life in your years .

zh-CN: 不要害怕生活将要结束，应该担心你的生活永远不会真正开始。
en-US: fear not that the life shall come to an end , but rather fear that it shall never have a beginning .

zh-CN: 有些事情本身我们无法控制，只好控制我们自己。
en-US: something is out of our control , so we have to command ourselves .

zh-CN: 我曾以为你是唯一懂我的人。但是现在所有人都知道我很沮丧都时候你是唯一一个没有发现的人。
en-US: i thought you are the only one who understood me.but now when all the others konw i ’m upset , you are the only one who still don ’ t find it .

zh-CN: 有时候，你给别人最简单的建议，却是自己最难做到的。
en-US: sometimes , the simplest advice that you give to others is the hardest thing for you to follow .

zh-CN: 与其等到别人来爱你，不如自己学着努力多爱自己一些，如果今天的你没有比昨天更喜欢自己，那明天对你来说有什么意义呢？
en-US: it ’ s better to try hard to love yourself more than to wait someone to love u. if today you don't like yourself more than yesterday , so what's the meaning of tomorrow ?

zh-CN: ——以往，我只在人前呈现出最好的一面。
en-US: in the past ， i only wanted people to see the best of me ．

zh-CN: 如今我不介意你看到我的缺点，因为我希望你接受的，是一个完整的我。
en-US: now ， i find that i do not mind your seeing my faults because i want you to accept me the way i am ．

zh-CN: 好的爱情是你通过一个人看到整个世界，坏的爱情是你为了一个人舍弃整个世界。
en-US: good love makes you see the whole world from one person while bad love makes you abandon the whole world for one person .

zh-CN: 我爱你，就像你不爱我一样的坚决。
en-US: i love you , looks like you not to love my same firmness .

zh-CN: 如果我们有勇气去追求，我们所有的梦想都可以成为现实。
en-US: all our dreams can come true ， if we have the courage to pursue them .

zh-CN: 所谓的自由，就是自己活着的理由，如果轻易放弃生命，那么在哪里都找不到自由的。
en-US: the so-called freedom is the reason to be alive. if you easily give up life , then you can never find freedom .

zh-CN: 孤单只表示身边没有别人，但寂寞是一种你无法将感受跟别人沟通或分享的心理状态。而真正的寂寞应该是连自己都忘了喜欢一个人的感觉。
en-US: being alone means you just have no one beside you but loneliness means that you can not talk with others and forget how it feels when you love someone .

zh-CN: 比起喧闹的人群来，悲伤和孤独也是很温暖的词语。
en-US: to the noisy crowd , sad and lonely is very warm words .

zh-CN: 爱不是彼此凝视，而是一起注视着同一个方向。
en-US: love does not consist in gazing at each other , but in looking outward together in the same direction .

zh-CN: 当你用手指指着别人的时候，请不要忘记，你的三根手指正在指向自己！
en-US: when you point at someone , please mind that you have three fingers pointing towards yourself !

zh-CN: 人最大的痛苦就是心灵没有归属，不管你知不知觉，承不承认。
en-US: a heart can't rest on another , a person pains deeper . no matter what you think , you must recognize it .

zh-CN: 最美的不是下雨天是与你一起躲过的屋檐。
en-US: the most wonderful thing is not rainy day but the eaves we stayed together .

zh-CN: 像是冲破黑暗突如其来的一道光，硬生生的刺入我的世界，却无关温暖。
en-US: like a light sudden breaks through the darkness , snatching pierced my world , is not warm .

zh-CN: 如果你找到了平静和幸福，人们可能会嫉妒你，不管怎样，还是要快乐。
en-US: if you find serenity and happiness , they may be jealous ; be happy anyway .

zh-CN: 感谢每一次新的挑战，因为它会塑造你的个性和力量。
en-US: be thankful for each new challenge , because it will build your strength and character .

zh-CN: 鲍勃迪伦说，我接受混沌，但我不知道混沌接不接受我。
en-US: “ i accept chaos. i am not sure whether it accepts me " . bob dylan

zh-CN: 从猴子变成人需要成千上万年，从人变回猴子只用一瓶酒。
en-US: it took thousands of years for monkeys to evolve into humans , but it will just take a bottle of wine for a man to evolve back into a monkey .

zh-CN: 我不是不理你，我只是在等你先开口。
en-US: i'm not ignoring you . i'm just waiting for you to talk to me first .

zh-CN: 假如你是一个仙人掌，我也愿意忍受所有的痛来拥抱你。
en-US: if you were a cactus , i'd endure all the pain just to hug you .

zh-CN: 在你想要放弃的那一刻，想想为什么当初坚持走到了这里。
en-US: the minute you think of giving up , think of the reason why you held on so long .

zh-CN: 其实酒不醉人，只是在喝的时候想起了那不堪的过去。

zh-CN: 我恨你的眼睛，你的嘴唇，你的拥抱，你的走路方式，我也恨你逗我笑，恨你不喜欢我。同时，我恨我自己这么的喜欢你。
en-US: i hate your eyes , i hate your lips , i hate your hugs , i hate the way you walk , i hate how you make me smile , i hate how you don't like me , and , i hate how much i like you .

zh-CN: 从此再不提起过去，痛苦或幸福，生不带来，死不带去。
en-US: i'll never mind the past from now on , no matter how sorrowful or wonderful it is.life comes and goes with nothing .

zh-CN: 给我一点点时间，一点点耐心，一点点信心，让我证明我有多爱你！
en-US: give me a little bit of time , a little bit of patience , a little bit of faith , to show you how much i love you .

zh-CN: 你是某人生命拼图中的一小块，也许你永远都不知道自己的位置，但请记住：没有你，他的生命是不完整的。
en-US: you are a part of a puzzle 0f someone’s life. you may never kn0w where you fit , but always remember that someone’s life may not be complete without you !

zh-CN: 自己已不再单纯了,那是长大的回忆。也有成熟付出的代价,说不清的许许多多。

zh-CN: 拥有的创造出生活，但是，付出的创造出生命。
en-US: from what we get , we can make a living , what we give , however , makes a life .

zh-CN: 不要把错误的举动当为成就，我们容易经由忙碌而被误导。
en-US: don't mistake movement for achievement. it's easy to get faked out by being busy .

zh-CN: 你是我猜不到的不知所措，我是你想不到的无关痛痒。

zh-CN: 一次痛彻心扉的经历，抵得上千百次的告诫。

zh-CN: 如果只是遇见，不能停留，不如不遇见。或许，你不应该再喜欢他了。你只是在伤害你自己。

en-US: every person need a friend to make them laugh when they think they will never smile again .

en-US: enjoy the little things in life , for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things .

zh-CN: 每段青春都会苍老，但我希望记忆里的你一直都好。
en-US: each youth will be old , but i hope that your memories have been good .

en-US: this is your world . shape it or someone else will . change before you have to .

zh-CN: 只要你相信自己，你就会懂得如何生活。
en-US: as soon as you trust yourself , you will know how to live .

en-US: to like a person is not wrong , it is wrong to like a person who does not like you .

zh-CN: 不论你在什么时候开始，重要的是开始之后就不要停止。不论你在什么时候结束，重要的是结束之后就不要悔恨。
en-US: no matter when you start , it is important that you do not stop after starting. no matter when you end , it is more important that you do not regret after ended .

zh-CN: 判断一个人，看他的回答不如看他所提出的问题。

zh-CN: 挽回的人其实很笨，去挽回一个抛弃你的人，满足他的虚荣他的骄傲。

en-US: if a man urge me to tell wherefore i love him , i feel that it can not be expressed but by answering , " because it was he , because it was myself. "

zh-CN: 所有的事都能好了伤疤忘了疼，唯独爱情不行。

zh-CN: 我只想找一个真心理解我，爱我的Ta度过我的一生，否则我宁愿独自一个人.

zh-CN: 也许阳光曾伫立，但悲伤一直都在我心里不曾消逝。

en-US: please do not suspect that i to your love , that am not young frivolous , i knew that is i is willing to accompany you to pass through the life the courage .

zh-CN: 应当在朋友正是困难的时候给予帮助，不可在事情已经无望之后再说闲话。
en-US: it shall be when friends to help , difficulties in things have not hopeless. after say gossip .

zh-CN: 假如生活欺骗了你，不要悲伤，不要心急.忧郁的日子里需要镇静。相信吧，快乐的日子将会来临。
en-US: if by life you were deceived , don't be dismal , don't be wild , in the day of grief , be mild , merry days will come , believe !

zh-CN: 我们每违背自己的感觉做一次事情，斗志就会削弱一点。

en-US: believe that god puts someone in your life for a reason , and removes him from your life for a better reason .

zh-CN: 如果一个女孩沉默了，是很危险的。她可能:1、想多了2、厌倦了等待3、要爆炸了4、需要拥抱5、崩溃了6、心在哭泣7、以上全部。
en-US: if a girl is silenty , it ’ s dangerous...she ’ either : 1. over thinking 2. tired of waiting 3. about to blow up 4. needs a hug 5. falling apart 6. crying inside 7. all of the above .

zh-CN: 我真想知道为什么人一旦得到他们想要的，就突然变了。

en-US: i want to write a letter into your dream , but i never know the address .

zh-CN: 感受梦的火焰，感觉飞舞瞬间，当一切浪漫遥远，永恒依然。
en-US: to feel the flame of dreaming and to feel the moment of dancing , when all the romance is far away , the eternity is always there .

en-US: when we are young , we may want several love experiences. but as time goes on , you will realize that if you really love someone , the whole life will not be enough .

zh-CN: 只有当另一颗心接受吟唱，才会使得用心歌唱的心灵完美。那些期盼歌唱的人们一定心有所属!

zh-CN: 當某天某個人走進你生命時，你就會明白，真愛總是值得等待的。

zh-CN: 如果你很有天赋，勤勉会使其更加完善;如果你能力一般，勤勉会补足其缺陷。

en-US: always be a first-rate version of yourself , instead of a second-rate version of somebody else .

zh-CN: 当你理解了世界的本来面目，依然热爱这个世界，你的生命就会是美丽的。

zh-CN: 我已经迫不及待的想和你共度余生了。

zh-CN: 守住的是仓皇而班驳的灾难、是用整个生命也敌不过的假象。

en-US: if you want a happy life , tie it to a goal , not to people or thing .

zh-CN: 如果有机会为母亲做顿饭，你会选择立刻就做还是等到以后某一天再说？
en-US: if you had a chance to prepare dinner for your mother , would you choose to make it right now or some day in the future ?

zh-CN: 如果你是我眼中的一滴泪，我永远都不会哭，因为我怕那样会失去你。
en-US: if you were a tear in my eye i would never want to cry because i would be scared to lose you .

zh-CN: 生活有时是令人沮丧的，但你可以努力让自己的过得开心起来。
en-US: life is sad but it is up to you to make your own life happy .

zh-CN: 与其找寻美丽的脸庞，不如找寻美丽的心灵。美丽的事物不一定都美好，但美好的事物必定美丽。

zh-CN: 假如你是一个仙人掌，我也愿意忍受所有的痛来抱着你。

en-US: there ’ s nothing more beautiful than a smile that struggles through tears .

zh-CN: 我们可以往返月球，但却难以迈出一步去亲近我们的左邻右舍。
en-US: we reached the moon and came back , but we find it troublesome to cross our own street and meet our neighbors .

zh-CN: 很多时候，男人会让你觉得他爱上了你，其实他真没有；而女人会让你觉得她不可能会爱上你，结果她却动了心。
en-US: a guy will make you think he loves you , but he really doesn't . a girl will make you think she doesn't love you , when she really does .

zh-CN: 宽恕并不代表忘记，也不代表赦免，而是放自己一条生路。
en-US: to forgive is not to forget , nor remit , but let it go .

zh-CN: 即是说一千遍我爱你，但只要一句分手就可以结束。这就是爱情。
en-US: was said that 1000 i loved you , so long as but bid good-bye may finish. this is a love .

zh-CN: 我认为最美丽的女人不是她自身，而是她营造的美丽氛围。
en-US: i think the most beautiful woman is not her own , but she create beautiful atmosphere 。

zh-CN: 我们只是从对方生命中不小心经过，留下了无法忘怀的气味..
en-US: we are only from each other's life was not careful , could not forget . .

zh-CN: 如果她很棒，不会很好追。如果她很好追，则不会很棒。如果她值得，你不该放弃。如果你放弃，则是你不配。
en-US: if she's amazing , she won't be easy. if she's easy , she won't be amazing. if she's worth it , you won't give up. if you give up , you ' re not worth it .

zh-CN: 当生活给你一百个理由哭泣时，你就拿出一千个理由笑给它看。
en-US: when the life give you a hundred reasons to cry , show life that you have a thousand reasons to smile .

zh-CN: 如果你爱一个人，你会了解她的一切，而不需要问她；如果你不爱一个人，即使她告诉你她的一切，你也还是会忘记的。
en-US: if you love someone , you will know everything about her withoutasking her ; if you don't love someone , you will forget everything even if she told you everything .

zh-CN: 我最害怕的一件事情是，看着我心爱的人爱上另外一个人。
en-US: one of my biggest fears is watching the person i love , love someone else .

zh-CN: 有时候我只愿意听你唱完一首歌，而不再觉得失去是舍不得。在所有人事已非的景色里，我最喜欢你。
en-US: i just wanna listen to the song you sing , while i no longer feel reluctant to lose. all scenery changing , i only like you .

zh-CN: 做最真实的自己就好了，总有一天你会找到一个人，他会爱上你的一切。
en-US: just be yourself and one day you will find someone who loves you for everything you are .

zh-CN: 主动久了会很累，在乎久了会崩溃!
en-US: active long will be very tired , care about for a long time will crash !

zh-CN: 我已经决定了，要做个快乐的人，因为这对我的健康很有益。
en-US: i have decided to be happy , because it is good for my health .

zh-CN: 我知道的最短的词是“I”。我知道的最甜蜜的词是“Love”。我永远都不会忘记的人是“You”。
en-US: the shortest word i know is “ i”. the sweetest word i know is “ love ” . and the person i never forget is “ you ”

zh-CN: 我宁愿爱上一个我不能拥有的人，也不想拥有一个我无法爱上的人。
en-US: i`d rather love someone i can ` t have than have someone i can ` t love 。

zh-CN: 无论如何，不能让某个人成为你的全部,若是有天他离开了，你将一无所有。
en-US: never make somebody your everything , because when they are gone you will have nothing left .

zh-CN: 没他前，你快乐过。（所以，）你会重新快乐起来。
en-US: you were once happy without him. you will be happy again .

zh-CN: 这个世界上的每个人都需要有人依靠。有时生活里，那个我们认为一直会在那里，让我们依靠的人也会离开。
en-US: everyone in the world needs someone they can depend on. but occasionally in life , the people we thought would always be there for us leave .

zh-CN: 一沙一世界，一花一天堂。把无限握在你的手掌，永恒在刹那间收藏。
en-US: to see a world in a grain of sand , and a heaven in a wild flower , hold infinity in the palm of your hand , and eternity in an hour .

zh-CN: 如果你希望成功，当以恒心为良友、以经验为参谋、以谨慎为兄弟、以希望为哨兵。
en-US: if you wish to succeed , you should use persistence as your good friend , experience as your reference , prudence as your brother and hope as your sentry .

zh-CN: 常常想起曾和你在一起的那些日子.开心、快乐、幸福、失落、伤心、痛苦的所有日子。很想你，很想你。
en-US: those days when we were together appear in my mind time after time , because they were so joyful , happy , blest , disappointing , sad and painful. i miss you , and miss you so much..

zh-CN: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒，而是机会之杯。因此，让我们毫无畏惧，满心愉悦地把握命运。
en-US: our destiny offers not the cup of despair , but the chalice of opportunity. so let us seize it , not in fear , but in gladness .

zh-CN: 我的世界不允许你的消失，不管结局是否完美。
en-US: no matter the ending is perfect or not , you cannot disappear from my world .

zh-CN: 我们不能同时去办所有的事，但我们能立即去办一些事。
en-US: we cannot do everything at once , but we can do something at once .

zh-CN: 让我们失去所拥有的不仅仅是死亡，还有离别和离去，还有改变，放弃和前行..
en-US: for we lose not only by death , but also by leaving and being left , by changing and letting go and moving on..

zh-CN: 两个人因为开心在一起叫喜欢，如果不开心还想要在一起那就是爱了…
en-US: two men because happy together that like ， if not happy also want together that is love ．

zh-CN: 等你获得真正属于你的幸福之后，你就会明白一起的伤痛其实是一种财富，它让你学会更好地去把握和珍惜你爱的人。
en-US: when you finally get your own happiness , you will understand the previous sadness is kind of treasure , which makes you better to hold and cherish the people you love .

zh-CN: 每个女孩都一样,只不过有的人用坚强的外表掩盖了脆弱的内心。
en-US: every girl is same , just some people with strong appearance covered fragile heart .

zh-CN: 好事情总是发生在那些微笑着的人身上。你今天微笑了么？
en-US: good things come to those who smile . have you smile today ? keep smiling .

zh-CN: 这世界并不会在意你的自尊。这世界指望你在自我感觉良好之前先要有所成就。
en-US: the world won't care about your self-esteem. the world will expect you to accomplish something before you feel good about yourself .

zh-CN: 每个人都是一轮月亮,都有着从不示人的阴暗一面。
en-US: everyone is a moon and has a dark side which he never shows to anybody .

zh-CN: 也许他们忘记了你说过什么，但他们绝不会忘记你给他们的感觉。
en-US: they may forget what you said , but they will never forget how you made them feel .

zh-CN: 一旦你有梦想,就要去争取，永远都不要轻易放弃，你的梦想可能不会在一两天实现，但某一天一定会.坚持到最后的就是真正的赢家.
en-US: once you have a dream , just go for it , never give it up easily ; your dream might not come true in one day or two , but it will someday .

zh-CN: 日出东海落西山，愁也一天，喜也一天；遇事不钻角尖，人也舒坦，心也舒。
en-US: sunrise east xishan , sorrow also day falls , xi also day ; beareth not drill tip , the human is also comfortable corner schwartz , the heart also .

zh-CN: 不管未来多苦多难有他陪你完成虽然爱是种责任。给要给得完整。
en-US: no matter how many painstakingly his future with you finish although love is a responsibility.give to give to complete .

zh-CN: 历史使人明智；诗词使人灵秀；数学使人周密；哲学使人深刻；伦理使人庄重；逻辑修辞学使人善辨。
en-US: histories make men wise ; poems witty ; the mathematics subtle ; philosophy deep ; moral grave ; logic and rhetoric able to contend .

zh-CN: 生活的幸福程度永远跟你的分享精神成正比。一颗有爱的心总是能给人带来幸福和快乐。
en-US: the quality of the life you live... has everything to do with what you ' re willing to give. a good heart always brings joy .

zh-CN: 一切都不是规划出来的。人生充满了不确定，你只能努力，实在不用想太多，因为你心中的疑惑不会有答案的。
en-US: a perfect plan isn't better than action and life isn't determinate.pondering won't bring the answer of your doubts.just do it harder and harder .

zh-CN: 只要你明白，珍惜爱与被爱，我愿意等待，你给我的未来。
en-US: if you understand the value of love and love you have given me i have to wait for the future .

zh-CN: 我们若能大笑世事无常，好好活一场，死神也会战栗一旁。
en-US: we are here to laugh at the odds and live our lives so well that death will tremble to take us .

zh-CN: 不喜欢就不要选择，选择了就要坚持。
en-US: don't make the choice if you dislike , once you make the decision , please hold on .

zh-CN: 你需要忘记失去的，感激拥有的，和期待即将到来的。
en-US: you need to forget what has gone , appreciate what has left , and look forward to what's next .

zh-CN: 永远无需解释你自己，（因为）朋友用不着你解释，敌人也不会相信的。
en-US: never explain yourself. your friends don ’ t need it , and your enemies won ’t believe it .

zh-CN: 人一定要经得起假话，受得起敷衍，忍得住欺骗，忘得了诺言，放得下一切。
en-US: women must be able to deal with lies , tolerate perfunctory responses , endure deceptions , forget promises and let go of everything .

zh-CN: 我早上愿意醒来为两个理由：闹钟和你。
en-US: there are two reasons why i wake up in the morning my alarm clock and you .

zh-CN: 有些人我们叫着亲爱的却并不真心喜欢，有些人我们骂着傻瓜却是真的爱着。
en-US: we call some people dear without a heart to love. but for some we call idiot , we love them truly .

zh-CN: 把所有的不快给昨天，把所有的希望给明天，把所有的努力给今天。
en-US: leave all your unhappiness to yesterday , give all your hopes to tomorrow , and do all your hard work today .

zh-CN: 我过得还可以，不好不坏，不惊不喜，一切只是还可以。这样的生活我觉得也挺好。
en-US: i'm doing okay , not great , not amazing , not horrible , just okay. and that is okay .

zh-CN: 等待是一种痛。忘掉也是一种痛。但不知道该怎么办，是一种更折磨人的痛。
en-US: waiting is painful. forgetting is painful.but not knowing which to do is the worse kind of suffering .

zh-CN: 幸福是一段旅程而不是终点，所以，工作吧，就像不需要金钱一样，去爱吧，就像从未受过伤一样，跳舞吧，就像没有人注视一样。
en-US: happiness is a journey , not a destination. so work like you don ’ t need the money , love like you have never been hurt , and dance like no one’s watching .

zh-CN: 有些事，做了才知道。有些事，错了才知道。有些事，长大了才知道。
en-US: something you will realize only when you doit , when you make mistakes or when you grow up .

zh-CN: 沉默是避免许多问题的方法。微笑是解决许多问题的方法。
en-US: silence isthe way to avoid many problems. smile is the way to solve many problems .

zh-CN: 如果把我们能做到的都做了，最终连我们自己都会被吓到。
en-US: if wedid all the things we are capable of doing , we would literally astoundourselves .

zh-CN: 女人真正的美丽不在于外表，而在于她的灵魂，在于她对别人亲切的关怀，以及对生活的热情。
en-US: the beauty ofa woman is not in a facial mode , but the true beauty in a woman is reflected inher soul . it is the caring that she lovingly gives , the passion that sheshows .

zh-CN: 一生中你唯一需要回头的时候，是为了看自己到底走了多远。
en-US: the only timeyou should look back in life , is to see how far you have come .

zh-CN: 人们总是想得到更多，却忘了他们已经拥有的。
en-US: people are always looking for more and forgetabout what they already have .

zh-CN: 人生可以走的路有很多，有些是我们自己可以选择的，有些却是我们必须接受的。
en-US: there aremany paths you can take in life. some you can choose , others are chosen for you .

zh-CN: 累，有时候也是种享受，因为它让生活变得充实。
en-US: sometimes tiredness is also something to be enjoyed , as it shows that you ' re living life to the full .

zh-CN: 若别人的剧本里根本没有你，那么你是很难在别人的生活里去扮演什么角色的。
en-US: it's hard to take a role in someone's life when you ' re not even part of the script .

zh-CN: 如果你等到每件事都确定是对的才去做，那你也许永远都成不了什么事。
en-US: if you waitto do everything until you ' re sure it's right , you'll probably never do much of anything .

zh-CN: 一个女生幻想她和男朋友的未来，是很自然的。而一个男生开始思考他和女朋友的未来，他是认真的。
en-US: when agirl thinks of her future with her boyfriend , it's normal. but when a boythinks of his future with his girlfriend , he's serious .

zh-CN: 在生命中，有一个即使不在你身边，也能逗你笑的人，是一件幸福的事。
en-US: it's always niceto have someone in your life that makes you smile even when they're not around .

zh-CN: 很多人一开始为了梦想而忙，后来忙得忘了梦想。
en-US: many peoplestart a career with a dream , then get busy forgetting it .

zh-CN: 有两件事你永远也不能放弃，那就是生命和爱。
en-US: the two things you must never give up are life and love .

zh-CN: 当你知道你错在哪里，惩罚显得不再那么痛苦，因为一切都是你应得的。
en-US: when you know what you have done wrong , punishment is not so painful because it feels deserved .

zh-CN: 成功人生四步曲：1、耐住寂寞；2、抵住诱惑；3、懂得放弃；4、学会选择。
en-US: four steps tosucceed : stand the loneliness , withstand the temptation , understand how to give up , learn to choose .

zh-CN: 学会忽略，是通向内在平静的一条大路。
en-US: learning toignore things is one of the great paths to inner peace .

zh-CN: 如果有个人能让你忘掉过去，那TA很可能就是你的未来。
en-US: ifsomeone in your life makes you forget your past , that someone is probably yourfuture .

zh-CN: 睡觉之前想的最后一个人，是真正占据你内心的人。
en-US: the lastperson you think about before you fall asleep is the one who truly owns yourheart .

zh-CN: 青春太好，好到你无论怎么过都觉浪掷，回头一看，都要生悔。
en-US: youth is too good , good to have you no matter how all feel wasted , a look back , all have regrets .

zh-CN: 生活就像随风飘散的蒲公英，看似自由，却身不由己。
en-US: life is like a dandelion floating in the wind - it seems free and unrestrained , but is actually without the ability to act of its own will .

zh-CN: 生活就像骑单车，为了保持平衡你必须一直往前。
en-US: life is likeriding a bicycle. to keep your balance you must keep moving .

zh-CN: 不是每件事都注定会成功，但是每件事都值得一试。
en-US: noteverything is meant to be . but everything is worth a try .

zh-CN: 别因为那些不重要的事情，使你错过那些真正重要的事情。
en-US: don't letsomething that doesn't matter cause you to lose something that does .

zh-CN: 命运不是机遇，而是选择。命运不靠等待，而凭争取。
en-US: destiny isnot a matter of chance , it is a matter of choice ; it is not a thing to be waitedfor , it is a thing to be achieved .

zh-CN: 别放弃，一步一步走下去，别让机会从眼前溜走，最终你会到达你想去的地方。
en-US: don't giveup , just keep putting one foot in front of the other , keep your eyes open toopportunities and you'll get where you want .

zh-CN: 真正的爱情需要等待，谁都可以说爱你，但不是人人都能等你。
en-US: being able towait is a sign of true love and patience . anyone can say she loves you but noteveryone can wait for you .

zh-CN: 生命短暂。有些重要的话，要是现在不说，就没机会说了。
en-US: life is short. there is no time to leave important words unsaid .

zh-CN: 成功是位差劲的老师。它诱导聪明的人觉得：自己不能失败。
en-US: success is a lousy teacher . it seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose .

zh-CN: 你不尝试着做些能力之外的事情，就永远无法成长。
en-US: unless you try to do something beyond what you have already mastered , or you will never grow up .

zh-CN: 你从哪里来并不重要，最重要的是你将要去哪里。
en-US: it doesn’t matter where you are coming from. all that matters is where you are going .

zh-CN: 爱上一个人的重要标志就是：遇上任何美景都在遗憾，为何你不在身边。
en-US: fall in love with an important symbol is : any beauty met in regret , why you ' re not around .

zh-CN: 不要为别人怎么看你而烦恼。别人的看法并不重要，重要的是你怎么看待你自己。
en-US: give up worrying about what others think of you . what they think isn't important . what is important is how you feel about yourself .

zh-CN: 有时候，你必须要做你自己的英雄。因为有时候那些你离不开的人并不是都离不开你。
en-US: sometimes , you have to be your own hero.because sometimes the people you can't live without can live without you .

zh-CN: 最大的报复就是成就别人认为你做不到的事！
en-US: the greatest revenge is to accomplish what others say you cannot do .

zh-CN: 如果你等到每件事都确定是对的才去做，那你也许永远都成不了什么事。
en-US: if you wait to do everything until you ' re sure it's right , you'll probably never do much of anything .

zh-CN: 有些人还在继续梦想成功时，另一些人却已经醒来努力为之奋斗了。
en-US: some people dream of success while others wake up and work hard at it 。

zh-CN: 一些事情，当我们年轻的时候，无法懂得。当我们懂得的时候，已不再年轻。
en-US: some things , when we are young , we don't know . when we know the time , no longer young .

zh-CN: 没有播种，何来收获；没有辛劳，何来成功；没有磨难，何来荣耀；没有挫折，何来辉煌。
en-US: no pain , no palm ; no thorns , no throne ; no gall , no glory ; no cross , no crown .

zh-CN: 有些人我们叫着亲爱的却并不真心喜欢，有些人我们骂着傻瓜却是真的爱着。
en-US: we call some people dear without a heart to love.but for some we call idiot , we love them truly .

zh-CN: 我爱你不是因为你是谁，而是我在你面前可以是谁。
en-US: i love you not for who you are , but for who i am with you .

zh-CN: 我就是我，过去是，现在是，将来也是。
en-US: i am who i am and who i was and i am who i will always be .

zh-CN: 爱情是灯，友情是影子，当灯灭了，你会发现你的周围都是影子。
en-US: love is a lamp , while friendship is the shadow . when the lamp is off , you will find the shadow everywhere .

zh-CN: 忙碌是一种幸福，让我们没时间体会痛苦；奔波是一种快乐，让我们真实的感受生活；疲惫是一种享受，让我们无暇空虚。
en-US: busy is a blessing , let us no time to feel pain ; run around is a pleasure , so that we truly experience life ; fatigue is a pleasure , let us no time to empty .

zh-CN: 生命中最好的事情就是找到那个知道你所有的错误和缺点，却依然认为你非常棒的人。
en-US: the best thing in life is finding someone who knows all your mistakes and weaknesses , and still thinks you ’ re completely amazing .

zh-CN: 生命中令人悲伤的一件事是你遇到了一个对你来说很重要的人，但却最终发现你们有缘无份，因此你不得不放手。
en-US: a sad thing in life is when you meet someone who means a lot to you ， only to find out in the end that it was never meant to be and you just have to let go .

zh-CN: 但不知道该怎么办，是一种更折磨人的痛。
en-US: but not knowing which to do is the worse kind of suffering .

zh-CN: 生命中最美好的都是看不见的，这就是为什么我们会在接吻，哭泣，许愿的时候闭上眼睛。
en-US: the best things in life are unseen , that ’ s why we close our eyes when we kiss , cry and dream .

zh-CN: 做你自己，说出你的感受。因为那些对你重要的人不会介意，而那些介意的人对你并不重要。
en-US: be who you are and say what you feel because those who matter don ’t mind , and those that mind don ’t matter .

zh-CN: 爱是一种病，我赶上了。你是我的药，我上瘾了。
en-US: love is my sickness and you are my drug , i’m addicted .

zh-CN: ——当生活给你100个伤心的原因，你就还它1000个微笑的理由。
en-US: when life gives you a hundred reasons to cry , show life that you have a thousand reasons to smile .

zh-CN: 有时候，微笑就像创可贴。虽然掩饰住了伤口，但是心痛依然。
en-US: sometimes , smiles are like band-aids. they cover up the pain but it still hurts .

zh-CN: 如果你问我，你对我有多重要，我的回答是，你是独一无二的。
en-US: if you ask me how much you mean to me ， my answer will be that you are unique 。

zh-CN: 不要让自己被三件事所控制：过去，别人和金钱。
en-US: don't let yourself be controlled by these three things : your past , people , and money .

zh-CN: 真正的朋友就算不每天聊天，也不会疏离。
en-US: true friends won't grow apart even when they don't talk every day .

zh-CN: 如果你的双手仍被昨天的垃圾占据，你就无法获得任何新鲜的东西。
en-US: you can't reach for anything new if your hands are still full of yesterday's junk .

zh-CN: 不管是身处上坡还是下坡，适当的时候一定要懂得让自己停下来，驻足来回望是为了更好的迈入。
en-US: whether in uphill or decline , appropriate must know stop , stop to look is to better repositories .

zh-CN: 不要老是想着过去。接受现在，畅想未来，用一个最甜最美的微笑面对未来。
en-US: do not think about the past. accept the present.think for the future , and face tomorrow with a sweet and beautiful smile .

zh-CN: 属于自己的，不要放弃。已经失去的，留作回忆。
en-US: don't give up the things that belong to you and keep those lost things in memory .

zh-CN: 每个人都会经历失败从中学到教训，但最大的失败，却是从未尝试开始。
en-US: everyone experiences failure and learns from it , but the biggest failure is never trying to begin with .

en-US: how do you say goodbye to someone you can't imagine living without ? i didn't say goodbye. i didn't say anything. i just walked away .

zh-CN: 伤痛使你更坚强，恐惧使你更勇敢，心碎使你更明智。
en-US: pain makes you stronger . fear makes you brave. heartbreak makes you wiser .

en-US: only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly .

en-US: the youth is the water splashed out , waste of hard , hard again sorry 。

zh-CN: 抓住机会试一下吧，否则你永远不会知道结局有多美好。
en-US: take a chance , because you never know how perfect something can turn out to be .

zh-CN: 如果你不必处理过去，那么回忆是一件美好的事情。
en-US: memories are wonderful things , if you don't have to deal with the past .

zh-CN: 不要因为别人都结婚了就草草嫁人。一个人也可以活得很快乐，而且要快乐得多。
en-US: don't marry just because it seems everyone else is and you don't know you can be happy alone. multiple times .

zh-CN: 有时起初的隐忍可以避免一路的疼痛。

zh-CN: 不期望什么，坦然接受一切，那你就永远不会失望。

en-US: everybody has a forest of his own. those lost have lost and those have met will meet each other again .

en-US: when life gives you a hundred reasons to cry , show life that you have a thousand reasons to smile .

en-US: rather than love , than money , than faith , than fame , than fairness give me the truth .

en-US: we all have moments of desperation . but if we can face them head on , that ’ s when we find out just how strong we really are .

en-US: if no if , for our time would stay ? have seen before sunset , heard of the tide , were buried , unreal time into bubble .

en-US: a lot of people would rather stay single because they're tired giving their everything and end up with nothing ．

en-US: sunshine is warm ， time is quiet and good ， besides you have not come yet . so i do not dare to become old ！

zh-CN: 它能展翅飞翔，能阔步前进，能治愈创伤，能消逝而去，也能揭示真相。

zh-CN: 整理下自己的心情,忘记那些不愉快的往事，听听音乐，看看风景，说能说的话，做可做的事，走该走的路，见想见的人。
en-US: adjust your mood , forget those unhappy past , listen to the music , enjoy the view , say something proper , do what you can , go the right path , and meet who you want to .

en-US: smiling face , not to blame. leisurely , the heart , with you . destined to allow life to change , only a hundred years later , the life of a flower .

zh-CN: 心若一动，泪就千行。

zh-CN: 我一生中最幸运的两件事，一件是时间终于将我对你的爱消耗殆尽。

en-US: the face of a woman without a close look at the hearts of men without a closer look. some people , the body near the heart will far .

en-US: it ’ s better to not know which moment may be your last , every morsel of your entire being alive to the infinite mystery of it all. c ’est la vie . ”

en-US: stop trying to understand everything ， because sometimes it ’ s not meant to understand but ， rather to accept ．
