zh-CN: 我们将努力使今天成为您过得最愉快的母亲节。
en-US: we will try to make this your best mother's day ever .

zh-CN: 在这一天，我们将会抽空休息一下，想想妈妈们帮我们做了多少事。
en-US: on this day we all sit back and think about how much our mothers do for us .

zh-CN: 我已经告诉您许多次了，但是我将再说一次：我爱您，妈妈。
en-US: i've tried many times to tell you , but i'll say it again : i love you mother .

zh-CN: 虽然有时要告诉您并不太容易，但是我真的非常爱您，妈妈。
en-US: though it is hard to tell you sometimes , i do love you dearly , mom .

zh-CN: 聪明脑袋勤劳手，走遍天下贵如金。
en-US: a good head and an industrious hand are worth gold in any land .

zh-CN: 健康的身体贵于黄金铸成的皇冠。
en-US: a good healthy body is worth more a crown in gold .

zh-CN: 远亲不如近邻。
en-US: a good neighbour is better than a bother in the next village .

zh-CN: 出色的外科医生必须心明眼亮和有一双灵巧的手。
en-US: a good surgeon must have an eagle's eye , a lion's heart , and a lady's hand .

zh-CN: 好故事百听不厌。
en-US: a good tale is none the worse for being twice told .

zh-CN: 开玩笑总不能化敌为友，反而有时会失去朋友。
en-US: a joke never gains an enemy but often loses a friend .

zh-CN: 千里之行，始于足下。
en-US: a journey of a thousand miles begains with a single step .

zh-CN: 穷人的一只羔羊比富人的一头牛还要珍贵。
en-US: a lamb is as dear to a poor man as an ox to the rich .

zh-CN: 只要一个人还有追求，他就没有老。
en-US: a man is not old as long as he is seeking something .

zh-CN: 直到后悔取代了梦想，一个人才算老。
en-US: a man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams .

zh-CN: 成为伟人固然伟大，但成为真正的人更加伟大。
en-US: it's great to be great , but it's greater to be human .

zh-CN: 我们必须接受失望，因为它是有限的，但千万不可失去希望，因为它是无穷的。
en-US: we must accept finite disappointment , but we must never lose infinite hope .

zh-CN: 一个人的真正价值首先决定于他在什么程度上和在什么意义上从自我解放出来。
en-US: one's real value first lies in to what degree and what sense he set himself .

zh-CN: 玫瑰是红色的，紫罗兰是蓝色的。这张母亲卡是特别给您的。
en-US: roses are red , violets are blue . this card on mother's day is especially for you .

zh-CN: 我们也许不是一直都像天使那样乖巧，但我们确实感谢您的教诲。
en-US: we may not be angels all of the time , but we do appreciate what you do .

zh-CN: 这是我一点小小的心意，感谢您这么多年来所付出的一切。
en-US: here's a little token of my appreciation for all that you have done for me over the years .

zh-CN: 有时候好像不是这样，但是我真的爱您。
en-US: sometimes it may not seem like it , but i really do love you .

zh-CN: 全世界也许到处都有妈妈，但您是我惟一最在意的。
en-US: there may be moms all over the world , but you ' re the only one that matters to me .

zh-CN: 妈妈们应该得到的不只是一个节日，她们该获得荣誉勋章。
en-US: moms should get more than a special day , they should get a medal of honor .

zh-CN: 母亲节是妈妈们发现她们的小孩会把早餐做得很好的时刻。
en-US: mother's day is a time when mothers discover how well their children can prepar e breakfast .

zh-CN: 想想母亲节时，孩子们为妈妈所做的早餐；很明显的，如果没有妈妈，孩子们将会饿死。
en-US: considering the quality of food that children make their mothers on mother's day , it becomes apparent that without moms , their kids would starve to death .

zh-CN: 妈妈，我们很乐意为您准备早餐，不过我们想，如果带您上馆子，会比较保险一点。
en-US: we would love to fix breakfast for you mom , but we think it would be safer for us all if we took you out .

zh-CN: 这张卡片是想告诉您，在教养子女方面，您做得棒极了。
en-US: this card is to let you know that you have done a super job raising us children .

zh-CN: 在这个日子里，我们感谢妈妈为我们所做的一切。谢谢您。
en-US: this is the day that we appreciate all the things that moms do for us. thank you .

zh-CN: 对不起。我知道是我的错，但我真的很难在你面前放下骄傲承认错误。
en-US: i'm sorry. i know it's my fault , but it's just really hard to put my pride aside and admit that to you 。

zh-CN: 我之所以醋意大发，只是因为我爱你。我希望你能理解，希望你能接受我这肆无忌惮的爱，希望你能包容我的缺点。
en-US: i'm only jealous because i love you and i wish you could understand this and could be okay with me loving you as much as i do while still embracing my flaws .

zh-CN: 我需要你的关注，虽然这样的要求是那么孩子气、那么小气。
en-US: i need you to give me attention . it's just so juvenile and petty to ask for 。

zh-CN: 我讨厌坐下去时腰上的小肉肉，我讨厌自己放屁。
en-US: i am embarrassed of the way my stomach rolls when i slouch .

zh-CN: 我还讨厌自己毛毛躁躁总是犯错。为什么？反正我也搞不懂！
en-US: i am embarrassed of the fact that i fart and that i've made so many mistakes. why ? who knows .

zh-CN: 虽然作为一个智力正常的人，我也知道这些都不值得大惊小怪；
en-US: it's silly because as an intelligent , functioning person i should know that these things are normal , human and nothing to be judged for .

zh-CN: 但是，我是这样在乎你，多么希望你看到的我总是最好的啊！
en-US: but it's because i care about you and i want you to see me in the best way possible 。

zh-CN: 我只想知道你是不是真的爱我，或者你并不爱我，不停找借口只是因为不想伤害我？
en-US: i just want to know if you actually love me or if you make excuses because you don't but also don't want to hurt my feelings 。

zh-CN: 要是你自己都发现不了这些缺点，那就不要烦我给你指出来。
en-US: if you can't figure this one out on your own , don't get even angrier when i try to help you .

zh-CN: 要知道，彼此坦诚非常重要。只有非常非常爱你的人，才会不惜惹怒你也要纠正你的不足。
en-US: honesty is vital to this and there are only a few people who will love you enough to risk you getting mad at them for them to tell you something that's crucial to your development .

zh-CN: 我其实并不那么爱你。
en-US: i just wasn't that into you . we had a great time .

zh-CN: 的确，我们曾经很开心。我也曾像所有小女人一样幻想过我们的孩子如何如何。但是，我发现自己不想要孩子，甚至你。
en-US: i did my girl thing for a while where i got ahead of myself and dreamt up what our babies would look like but then decided i didn't want them or you .

zh-CN: 因为你说你不是很喜欢我，我觉得自己是个一无是处、不值得爱、笨拙又不讨喜的人。
en-US: because when you tell me that you ' re just not into me , i associate that with meaning i'm a worthless , unintelligent , undeserving , unattractive human being 。

zh-CN: 我们都心知肚明，是吧？我是女人，总得矜持一点；
en-US: you know and i know. i just don't have the balls to do something about it .

zh-CN: 但你可是男子汉，只要这次能主动一点，一切都会好起来。
en-US: you , however , do , literally have the testicles , so if you would step up to the plate this once that would be great .

zh-CN: 而是我实在放不开——所以，请你先主动一点吧！
en-US: but because i'm admitting that this is a weakness of mine and i need a little help to get the ball rolling 。

zh-CN: 时间比金钱有价值多了，你能有更多的钱，却不能有更多的时间。
en-US: time is more valuable than money. you can get more money , but you cannot get more time .

zh-CN: 如果你想知道上帝对钱的看法，只要去看看那些他给了钱的人就知道了。
en-US: if you want to know what god thinks about money , just look at the people he gives it to .

zh-CN: 有钱就能买只可爱的狗，但是有爱才能让它对你摇尾巴。
en-US: money will buy you a fine dog , but only love can make it wag its tail .

zh-CN: 钱可不是世界上最重要的，世界上最重要的是爱。幸运的是：我爱钱。
en-US: money is not the most important thing in the world . love is. fortunately , i love money .

zh-CN: 如果你想知道钱的价值，就试试去借钱吧。
en-US: if you would know the value of money , go and try to borrow some .

zh-CN: 最安全的让钱翻倍的方法就是把它折起来，放在口袋里。
en-US: the safest way to double your money is to fold it over and put it in your pocket .

zh-CN: 银行就是只有你能证明不是真的需要钱，它才会借给你钱的地方。
en-US: a bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don't need it .

zh-CN: 太多的人花费他们还没有挣到的钱，去买他们不想要的东西，来取悦他们不喜欢的人。
en-US: too many people spend money they haven't earned , to buy things they don't want , to impress people they don't like .

zh-CN: 鹰翔九天，但是鼬鼠从不会卷入飞机引擎。
en-US: eagles may soar , but weasels don't get sucked into jet engines

zh-CN: 每个老年人心里都会有一个年轻人在问：“怎么会发生这档子破事？”
en-US: inside every older person is a younger person wondering , " what the hell happened ? "

zh-CN: 只需记住——假如这个世界不是一张网，我们都会掉落。
en-US: just remember -- if the world didn't suck , we would all fall off .

zh-CN: 光速快于音速。这就是为什么你在听到他人的发言后才会意识到他们的存在。
en-US: light travels faster than sound. that's why some people appear bright until you hear them speak .

zh-CN: 生活并不太像一盒巧克力。它更像一罐墨西哥辣椒。
en-US: life isn't like a box of chocolates. it's more like a jar of jalapenos .

zh-CN: 问心无愧也许是坏记性的表现。
en-US: a clear conscience is usually the sign of a bad memory .

zh-CN: 假如你认为没有人关心你，试试拖欠一下应付款。
en-US: if you think nobody cares , try missing a couple of payments .

zh-CN: 当所有东西都朝你运动而来，那说明你走错了道。
en-US: when everything is coming your way , you ' re in the wrong lane .

zh-CN: 勤奋工作会在远期得到回报，而懒惰现期就会有所收获。
en-US: hard work pays off in the future. laziness pays off now .

zh-CN: 百分之四十二点七的数据是现场编造的。
en-US: 42.7 percent of all statistics are made up on the spot .

zh-CN: 早起的鸟儿或许有虫吃，不过第二只老鼠才会得到夹子中的奶酪。
en-US: the early bird may get the worm , but the second mouse gets the cheese in the trap .

zh-CN: 一个不能激发学生学习欲望的老师只是一个铁皮匠人。
en-US: a teacher who is attempting to teach without inspiring the pupil with a desire to learn is hammering on cold iron 。

zh-CN: 老师的影响是永恒的，他永远也不知道这影响到何处为止。
en-US: a teacher affects eternity ; he can never tell where his influence stops 。

zh-CN: 好的老师会把复杂的问题变简单，但从不会简化问题。
en-US: a good teacher is a master of simplification and an enemy of simplism 。

zh-CN: 言传不如身教。
en-US: what the teacher is , is more important than what he teaches 。

zh-CN: 学生就像银行，你可以存入你最宝贵的东西。
en-US: the student is a bank where you can deposit your most precious treasures 。

zh-CN: 教学就像栽培植物，对刺无计可施的园丁也培育不出花。
en-US: teaching is like cultivating a garden , and those who would have nothing to do with thorns must never attempt to gather flowers .

zh-CN: 为什么图书馆是最高的建筑？答案：因为它有所有的楼层。
en-US: why is the libray the highest building ? key : it has the most stories .

zh-CN: 大大的笑容和眼周深深的皱纹反应了你对生活潜在的态度，这种态度让你过一个长久健康的生活。
en-US: broader grins and wrinkles around the eyes reflect an underlying positive outlook on life that translates into better long-term health , the researchers believe 。

zh-CN: 单身意味着你足够坚强，有足够的耐心去等待值得拥有你的那个人。
en-US: bing single means that you are strong enough and patient to wait for the one who deseres you .

zh-CN: 当我成为你的心跳时，也许你会相信我爱你。
en-US: when i become your heartbeat , you maybe only are capable to do ding-dang believing that i love you .

zh-CN: 你若不离不弃，我必生死相依。
en-US: if you do not leave me , i will be by your side until the end .

zh-CN: 有时候，要得到你最想要的东西，你得做你最不想干的事情。
en-US: sometimes , to get what you want the most , you have to do what you want the least .

zh-CN: 有些事，不管我们如何努力，回不去就是回不去了。
en-US: some things , no matter how hard we try , can not go back to just can't go back .

zh-CN: 爱是永恒的，外表可能改变，但本质永远不变。
en-US: love is something eternal ; the aspect may change , but not the essence .

zh-CN: 爱不需要证据，需要的只是一双在难熬的时候可以握住的手。
en-US: love needs no proof , all it needs is a hand to hold in difficult times .

zh-CN: 这一刻全力以赴，下一刻成就最佳。
en-US: doing the best at this moment puts in the best place for the next moment .

zh-CN: 忧虑并不能阻止不好的事情发生，它只能阻止你享受生活中的美好！
en-US: worrying never stops the bad stuff from happening. it just keeps you from enjoying the good .

zh-CN: 即使没有人为你鼓掌，也要优雅的谢幕，感谢自己的认真付出。
en-US: even if you get no applause , you should accept a curtain call gracefully and appreciate your own efforts .

zh-CN: 没有人瞧不起你，因为别人根本就没有瞧你，大家都很忙的。
en-US: nobody looks down upon you for nobody simply glances at you . they are all quite busy .

zh-CN: 聪明的你，告诉我，为什么我们的日子总是离我们远去，却不再回头？
en-US: you the wise , tell me , why should our days leave us , never to return ?

zh-CN: 每个人都有不为人知的故事，不要轻易对别人品头论足。
en-US: everyone has a story left untold , so never start judging someone .

zh-CN: 所谓长大，就是你开始在乎以前你不在乎的事情了。
en-US: when you start to care about things that you didn't care about before , that's what we call growing up .

zh-CN: 有时候，似乎你越想忘记，记忆却越深刻。
en-US: sometimes , the harder you want to forget something , the more you seem to remember it .

zh-CN: 未来属于那些相信梦想之美的人。
en-US: the future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams .

zh-CN: 只有一个人能界定你一生的成就，那就是你自己。
en-US: there is only one person who can define success in your life —— and that's you .

zh-CN: 聪明就像是内衣，你得穿上，这很重要，但你炫耀，就没必要。
en-US: intelligence is like an underwear. it is important that you have it , but not necessary that you show it off .

zh-CN: 有时候，成功者只是一个永不放弃的追梦者。
en-US: sometimes a winner is just a dreamer that never gives up .

zh-CN: 重要的不是你得到了什么，而是你给予了什么。重要的不是你认识多少人，而是在你离开后，多少人会认为是个永远的损失。
en-US: what will matter is not what you got , but what you gave. what will matter is not how many people you knew , but how many will feel a lasting loss when you are gone .

zh-CN: 我希望能够独立！我想要我得自由！也许如果你想要这些，那么你真的需要坚强。
en-US: i want to be independent. i want my freedom . and maybe if you want that , you really need to be strong .

zh-CN: 幸福的关键不在于找到一个完美的人，而在找到一个人，然后和他一起努力建立一个完美的关系。
en-US: the key for happiness is not to find a perfect person , but find someone and build a perfect relationship with him .

zh-CN: 解释得太多就像我在怪你不懂我。
en-US: explained so much , but it ’ s like i am blaming that you don ’t understand .

zh-CN: 绝对不要让糟糕的一天变成倒霉的一生。
en-US: never let one bad day make you feel like you have a bad life .

zh-CN: 缘分不是人海中两个人的擦身，缘分是不可能的相遇。
en-US: love is not about running into each other in crowds. love is an impossible meeting .

zh-CN: 比如我是空中的鸟你是林中的豹，我们碰巧相爱。
en-US: for example , i am a bird flying in sky , you r a leopard in forest. we just fall in love accidentally .

zh-CN: 即使在最黑暗的时候，希望依然是存在的，它也许很遥远，不太清晰，但它就在那里。
en-US: even in the darkest of hours there is hope. you may have to look long and hard but its there .

zh-CN: 关于过去，关于你，告一段落。关于未来，关于我，敬请期待。
en-US: about the past , about you , to end. about the future , about me , please look !

zh-CN: 你越了解你自己，知道自己想要什么，就越不会被那些事情阻碍到。
en-US: the more you know who you are , and what you want , the less you let things upset you .

zh-CN: 不论什么时候开始，重要的是开始之后就不要停止。
en-US: no matter when u start , you do not stop after starting .

zh-CN: 不论什么时候结束，重要的是结束之后就不要悔恨。
en-US: no matter when u end , you do not regret after ended .

zh-CN: 最终，你真正拥有的不过只是你自己的故事。
en-US: in the end , the only thing you really own is your story .

zh-CN: 最好的学习是对过去的反思，最好的教训是你曾经历过的失败。
en-US: evaluating your past is the best learning you can do. there's no better lesson than failures you did in the past .

zh-CN: 不要再紧抓着伤痛不放，这样才能为好心情留出空间。
en-US: stop holding on to what hurts and make room for what feels good .

zh-CN: 你若想要得到，就别只是期望。人生短暂，经不起等待。
en-US: if you want something , don't wish for it. life is too short to wait .

zh-CN: 岁月使身体长出了皱纹，而放弃梦想则会使灵魂生出皱纹。
en-US: age wrinkles the body. quitting on your dreams wrinkles the soul .

zh-CN: 假如你是一个仙人掌，我也愿意忍受所有的痛来抱着你。
en-US: if you were a cactus , i’d endure all the pain just to hug you .

zh-CN: 我确信我热爱自己所做的事情，这就是这些年来支持我继续走下去的唯一理由。
en-US: i’m convinced that the only thing that kept me going was that i loved what i did .

zh-CN: 为了赢得成功，你对成功的欲望必须超过你对失败的恐惧。
en-US: in order to succeed , your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure !

zh-CN: 如果你问我，我会想要回到过去的任何一天。不为追悔，只为重温我们难忘的回忆。
en-US: if you asked me , i would go back to any day in the past. not to fix my regrets , but to relive all our unforgettable memories .

zh-CN: 令你感恩的，不是你口袋裡的，而是在你心中的。
en-US: it isn ’ t what you have in your pocket that makes you thankful , but what you have in your heart .

zh-CN: 你了解我的灵魂你知道我的一切你听见我的心声何时该让我停止何时放手让我前进你应该知道我爱你的一切。
en-US: you know my soul ， you know everything about me ， there ’ s to know you know my heart ， how to make me stop & how to make me go ， you should know i love everything about you .

zh-CN: "生命赋予我们每个人能力，无论多麽疲倦或被践踏过，我们都可以找到感恩的理由。”
en-US: “ one of life ’ s gifts is that each of us , no matter how tired and downtrodden , finds reasons for thankfulness . ”

zh-CN: "感恩始于感谢之心，谢意正好完成了感恩。感恩也许只是一堆言语文字，感谢却要以行动去表逹。”
en-US: “ thankfulneis the beginning of gratitude. gratitude is the completion of thankfulness. thankfulnemay consist merely of words. gratitude is shown in acts . ”

zh-CN: 谢意是受到恩惠后的内心感觉，感恩是渴望表达这感觉的自然反应，感恩节就是为这反应要生的。
en-US: gratitude is the inward feeling of kindnereceived . thankfulneis the natural impulse to exprethat feeling. thanksgiving is the following of that impulse .

zh-CN: 困难是好景的机遇，是重任的垫脚石。当一扇门关闭时，一定会有另一扇门打开。
en-US: difficulties are opportunities to better things ; they are stepping stones to greater experience . when one door closes , another always opens .

zh-CN: 培养感恩之心，答谢身边所有。这样的话，每一步都会是迈向更佳未来的一步。
en-US: develop an attitude of gratitude , and give thanks for everything that happens to you , knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger and better than your current situation .

zh-CN: 秋天的黄叶，它们没有什么可唱，只叹息一声，飞落在那里。
en-US: stray birds of summer come to my window to sing and fly away.and yellow leaves of autumn , which have no songs , flutter and fall there with a sign .

zh-CN: 我并不需要一个大大的公寓，许多精美的礼物或者是苍白的甜言蜜语。我只需要你。
en-US: i don't need a big flat , much beautiful presents or pale loving words , i just need you .

zh-CN: 为什么我还是如此的担心你，即使你都已经不是我的？
en-US: why am i so afraid to lose you when you are not even mine ?

zh-CN: 过去适宜回味，却不宜留恋。
en-US: past is a nice place to visit but certainly not a good place to stay .

zh-CN: 勇敢的做自己，不要为任何人而改变。如果他们不能接受最差的你，也不配拥有最好的你。
en-US: be yourself , don't change for anyone. if they don't like you at your worst , then they don't deserve you at your best .

zh-CN: 所谓的幸福，就是在平淡生活里的那一份执着和坚守。
en-US: the so-called happiness , it is a persistent in the plain living and persistence .

zh-CN: 如果你懂得珍惜，你会发现你获得的越来越多，如果你一昧追求，你会发现你失去的越来越快。
en-US: if you know how to cherish , you'll find out you get more and more , if you pursue , you'll find out you lose faster .

zh-CN: 不要活在别人的嘴里，不要活在别人的眼里，而是把命运握在自己手里。
en-US: don't live in someone else's mouth , don't live in someone else's eyes , but with the destiny in their own hands .

zh-CN: 你可以强颜欢笑，但你无法欺骗自己。
en-US: you can fake a smile , but you can't fake your feelings .

zh-CN: 我真的尊重那些即使完全有理由崩溃却依然坚强的人。
en-US: i truly respect the people who stay strong even when they have every right to break down .

zh-CN: 自尊源自真诚面对自己，自尊源自按自己的本性行事。
en-US: self-respect comes from being true to who you really are and from acting in accordance with your fundamental nature .

zh-CN: 我知道你最喜欢这首歌，我也知道你的心思，我想你。
en-US: i know you like this song most and i know what you are thinking about , too , i miyou .

zh-CN: 无论你犯了多少错，或者你进步得有多慢，你都走在了那些不曾尝试的人的前面。
en-US: no matter how many mistakes you make or how slow you progress , you are still way ahead of everyone who isn't trying 。

zh-CN: 如果你想要什么，那就勇敢地去追求，不要管别人是怎么想的，因为这就是实现梦想的方式。
en-US: if you are passionate about something , pursue it , no matter what anyone else thinks. that's how dreams are achieved 。

zh-CN: 世界真的很小，好像一转身，就不知道会遇见谁；世界真的很大，好像一转身，就不知道谁会消失。
en-US: the world is such small , it's like when you turn around , you don't know who you will see. the world is so big , as if when you turn around , you never know who will disappear .

zh-CN: 友谊法则第一条：永远不要让你的朋友感到孤单，所以啊，有事儿没事儿放心大胆去烦烦他们。
en-US: one law in friendship : never make your friend feel lonely , so disturb them as much as you can .

zh-CN: 我为自己的心感到骄傲。它曾受戏弄，曾经心焦，曾遭破碎，却依然鲜活跳动。
en-US: i'm proud of my heart . it's been played , burned , and broken , but it still works .

zh-CN: 当全世界约好一起下雨，让我们约好一起在心里放晴。
en-US: when the whole world is about to rain , let ’ s make it clear in our heart together .

zh-CN: 我会一直等你，直到没有再等下去的理由。
en-US: i will wait for you until i have no more reason to wait anymore .

zh-CN: 我突然很想忘了你，就像从未遇见你。
en-US: i suddenly want to forget you , just like i didn't meet you .

zh-CN: 生活不总是完美无缺，轻而易举或者合情合理。但这就是生活的美好之所在。
en-US: life isn't always perfect. life isn't always easy. life doesn't always make sense. but that's the beauty of life .

zh-CN: 有时候，你得做自己最应该做的事情，不管别人怎么想。
en-US: sometimes you have to do what's best for yourself , no matter what anybody else thinks .

zh-CN: 一切都会变，人来人往，你无能为力。爱上一个人然后再忘掉一个人，生活就是这样。
en-US: things change , people come and go ， you can't help that . fall in love and fall out of love. it's a part of life .

zh-CN: 永远都不要停止微笑，即使是在你难过的时候，说不定有人会因为你的笑容而爱上你。
en-US: never stop smiling , not even when youre sad , someone might fall in love with your smile .

zh-CN: 也许上帝让你在遇见那个合适的人之前遇见很多错误的人，所以，当这一切发生的时候，你应该心存感激。
en-US: maybe god wants you to meet many wrong jpeople before you meet the right one , so when this happens , youll be thankful .

zh-CN: 星光闪烁，圣诞老人来到你的床前，将欢乐与祝福，洒满你的房间。
en-US: stars are shining. may santa claus come to you with joys and happiness .

zh-CN: 没事。如果你曾倚着朋友的肩膀哭过，你就能体会有人告诉你“一起都会好起来”时的感觉。
en-US: it ’ s okay 。 if you ’ ve ever cried on the shoulder of a friend , you know how good it feels to have someone remind you that everything is going to be just fine 。

zh-CN: 值此圣诞佳节，我只有一句话要告诉你：我爱你。
en-US: on this christmas i have but one thing to say : i love you .

zh-CN: 圣诞节转眼又到，又该迎接新的一年了。我们向你及你的亲人们致以最美好的圣诞祝福，愿事业兴旺，幸福美满！
en-US: it seems that christmas time is here once again , and it is time again to bring in the new year. we wish you happiness and prosperity .

zh-CN: 只有每天再度战胜生活并夺取自由的人，才配享受生活的自由。
en-US: none is of freedom or of life deserving unless he daily conquers it anew . —— erasmus

zh-CN: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒，而是机会之杯。因此，让我们毫无畏惧，满心愉悦地把握命运。——尼克松
en-US: our destiny offers not the cup of despair , but the chalice of opportunity. so let us seize it , not in fear , but in gladness.——r.m. nixon

zh-CN: 生活没有目标，犹如航海没有罗盘。--罗斯金
en-US: living without an aim is like sailing without a compass.—— john ruskin

zh-CN: 卓越的天才不屑走旁人走过的路。他寻找迄今未开拓的地区。
en-US: towering genius disdains a beaten path. it seeks regions hitherto unexplored . —— lincoln

zh-CN: 没有伟大的意志力，便没有雄才大略。——巴尔扎克
en-US: there is no such thing as a great talent without great will - power . —— balzac

zh-CN: 不要害怕你的生活将要结束，应该担心你的生活永远不会真正开始。——纽曼
en-US: fear not that the life shall come to an end , but rather fear that it shall never have a beginning . ——j.h. newman

zh-CN: 生活的目标，是唯一值得寻找的财富。--史蒂文森
en-US: an aim in life is the only fortune worth finding . —— robert louis stevenson

zh-CN: 不要为成功而努力，要为做一个有价值的人而努力。——爱因斯坦
en-US: try not to become a man of success but rather try to become a man of value . ——a . einstein

zh-CN: 人必须有自信，这是成功的秘密。——卓别林
en-US: you have to believe in yourself. that's the secret of success.—— charles chaplin

zh-CN: 不管追求什么目标，都应坚持不懈。
en-US: pursue your object , be it what it will , steadily and indefatigably .

zh-CN: 我们必须接受失望，因为它是有限的，但千万不可失去希望，因为它是无穷的。——马丁·路德·金
en-US: we must accept finite disappointment , but we must never lose infinite hope . —— mattin luther king

zh-CN: 只有强者才懂得斗争；弱者甚至失败都不够资格，而是生来就是被征服的。——斯威特切尼
en-US: strength alone knows conflict , weakness is below even defeat , and is born vanquished . —— swetchine

zh-CN: 在这个世界上取得成就的人，都努力去寻找他们想要的机会，如果找不到机会，他们便自己创造机会。——萧伯纳
en-US: the people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for circumstances they want , and if they cannot find them , make them . —— bernara shaw

zh-CN: 强者能同命运的风暴抗争。——爱迪生
en-US: a strong man will struggle with the storms of fate . —— thomas addison

zh-CN: 尽管失败和挫折等待着人们，一次次地夺走青春的容颜，但却给人生的前景增添了一份尊严，这是任何顺利的成功都不能做到的。——梭罗
en-US: the failures and reverses which await men - and one after another sadden the brow of youth - add a dignity to the prospect of human life , which no arcadian success would do . —— henry david thoreau

zh-CN: 一个人可以失败很多次，但是只要他没有开始责怪旁人，他还不是一个失败者。
en-US: a man can fail many times , but he isn't a failure until he begins to blame somebody else .

zh-CN: 有的东西比才能稀罕得多，珍贵得多，这就是识别的能力。
en-US: there is something that is much more scarce , something rarer than ability. it is the ability to recognize .

zh-CN: 事越做越能，人越忙越有空。
en-US: the more we do , the more we can do ; the more busy we are , the more leisure we have .

zh-CN: 一个人，正如一个时钟，是以他的行动来定其价值的。
en-US: a man , like a watch , is to be valued by this manner of going .

zh-CN: 所有幸福的家庭都相似，而每个不幸的家庭各不同。
en-US: all happy families are like one another ; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way .

zh-CN: 友谊既是快乐之源泉，又是健康之要素。
en-US: friendship is both a source of pleasure and a component of good health .

zh-CN: 追求自身的利益，不是自私；只有忽视他人的利益，才是自私。
en-US: a man is called selfish , not pursuing his own good , but neglecting his neighbour's .

zh-CN: 人们需要相互了解才能达到最诚实的境界。
en-US: people need to know one another to be at their honest best .

zh-CN: 世界的悲剧就在于有想象力的人缺乏经验，而有经验的人缺乏想象力。
en-US: the tragedy of the world is that those who are imaginative have but slight experience , and those who are experienced have feeble imagination .

zh-CN: 赢得核战争的方法是确保它永远不会发生。
en-US: the way to win an atomic war is to make certain it never starts .

zh-CN: 经验是当你没得到想得到之物时所得到的东西。
en-US: experience is what you get when you don't get what you want .

zh-CN: 如果你年轻时没有学会思考，那就永远学不会思考。
en-US: if you don't learn to think when you are young , you may never learn .

zh-CN: 经验给了我们太多的教训，告诉我们人类最难管制的东西，莫过于自己的舌头。
en-US: experience more than sufficiently teaches that men govern nothing with more difficult than their tongues .

zh-CN: 不管是谁，匆匆忙忙只能说明他不能从事他所从事的工作。
en-US: whoever is in a hurry shows that the thing he is about is too big for him .

zh-CN: 一次痛苦的经验抵得上千百次的告诫。
en-US: one thorn of experience is worth a whole wilderness of warning .

zh-CN: 整个一生，我们都有赖于从一些人群中获得友爱、赏识、尊重、道义支持和帮助。
en-US: throughout life , we rely on small groups of people for love , admiration , respect , moral support and help .

zh-CN: 不肯让朋友共享果实的人，不要指望朋友与他共患难。
en-US: he that will not allow his friend to share the prize must not expect him to share the danger .

zh-CN: 少壮不努力，老大徒伤悲。
en-US: no man is the whole of himself ; his friends are the rest of him.a young idler , an old beggar .

zh-CN: 名称有什么关系呢？玫瑰不叫玫瑰，依然芳香如故。—Shakespeare
en-US: what's in a name ? that which we call a rose by any other name would smell as sweet .

zh-CN: 崇高与荒谬仅一步之遥。
en-US: there is but one step from the sublime to the ridiculous .

zh-CN: 如果没有了图书馆，我们还有什么呢？我们没有了过去也没有了未来。
en-US: without libraries what have we ? we have no past and no future .

zh-CN: 生活中没有可怕的东西，只有应去了解的东西。
en-US: nothing in life is to be feared . it is only to be understood .

zh-CN: 今儿个准备去看电影「饥饿游戏」，不确定怎么样，但是还是期待下吧。
en-US: about to see the hunger games. not sure exactly what to expect , but looking forward to it nonetheless .

zh-CN: 最后我还忙着帮Lulu准备她的期末考试，还有带着她去参加她所有的网球比赛，她赢了很多场比赛，我们很为她骄傲
en-US: finally i have been busy helping lulu prepare for her final exams and taking her to all her tennis tournaments. she has won so many matches , and we are so proud of her

zh-CN: 请你们注意,我并不想要用任何方式嘲笑、看轻或是批评这位可怜的、已故的姑娘
en-US: mind you , i am not seeking to flout or belittle or reflect in any way on this poor , dead girl .

zh-CN: 就在太阳将要升起的时候，我在一个城外公园的破烂的浴缸里找到了贾森
en-US: just before sunrise i found jason in a half shattered bathtub in a park outside of town .

zh-CN: 对dannylohner说，你最好再带着我去，不然我就撕破你的喉咙。
en-US: to dannylohner ， you better take me again. or i'll slit your throat .

zh-CN: 书虫们会完全将喜欢的虚构角色的感情、思想、信仰和内心活动过继到自己身上，这一现象被称为”经历采集”。[多读励志作品吧~~~]
en-US: bookworms will adopt the feelings , thoughts , beliefs and internal responses of fictional characters they like in a phenomenon called “ experience-taking .

zh-CN: 大自然永远不会欺骗我们，欺骗我们的往往是我们自己。
en-US: nature never deceives us ; it is always us who deceive ourselves .

zh-CN: 时间是个多才多艺的表演者。它能展翅飞翔，能阔步前进，能治愈创伤，能消逝而去，也能揭示真相。
en-US: time is a versatile performer . it flies , marches on , heals all wounds , runs out and will tell .

zh-CN: 在所有头脑的影响之中，大自然的影响可谓是在时间上最先，在作用上最为重要的。
en-US: the first in time and the first in importance of the influences upon the mind is that of nature .

zh-CN: 科学的本质是：问一个不恰当的问题，于是走上了通往恰当答案的路。
en-US: that is the essence of science : ask an impertinent question , and you are on the way to the pertinent answer .

zh-CN: 在过去人们面临的危险是变成奴隶，而在将来危险是人类可能变成机器人。
en-US: the danger of the past was that men became slaves. the danger of the future is that men may become robots .

zh-CN: 知识是一宝库，而实践就是开启宝库大门的钥匙。
en-US: knowledge is a treasure , but practice is the key to it .

zh-CN: 热爱大自然的人内外感觉协调一致，即使进入成年后依然保持着童心。
en-US: the lover of nature is he whose inward and outward senses are still truly adjusted to each other ; who has retained the spirit of infancy even into the era of manhood .

zh-CN: 以爱心聚在一起的十个人能够完成一万个分散的人做不到的事情。
en-US: ten men banded together in love can do what ten thousand separately would fail in .

zh-CN: 今天不同于昨天。我们自己也在改变。那么，我们的著作和思想，如果想永远不过时，怎么能始终不改变呢？
en-US: today is not yesterday. we ourselves change . how then can our works and thoughts , if they are always to be fittest , continue always the same ?

zh-CN: 只有爱才能使原子的力量造福人类，而非危害人类。
en-US: love alone can release the power of the atom so it will work for man and not against him .

zh-CN: 不要只因一次失败，就放弃你原来决心想达到的目的。(英国剧作家莎士比亚.W.)
en-US: do not , for one repulse , give up the purpose that you resolved to effect. ( william shakespeare , british dramatist )

zh-CN: 不要放弃你的幻想。当幻想没有了以后，你还可以生存，但是你虽生犹死。（(美国作家马克·吐温)
en-US: don't part with your illusions. when they are gone you may still exist , but you have ceased to live. ( mark twain , american writer )

zh-CN: 我想揭示大自然的秘密，用来造福人类。我认为，在我们的短暂一生中，最好的贡献莫过于此了。(美国发明家爱迪生.T.)
en-US: i want to bring out the secrets of nature and apply them for the happiness of man . i don't know of any better service to offer for the short time we are in the world. ( thomas edison , american inventor )

zh-CN: 理想是指路明灯。没有理想，就没有坚定的方向；没有方向，就没有生活。(俄国作家托尔斯泰.L.)
en-US: ideal is the beacon. without ideal , there is no secure direction ; without direction , there is no life. ( leo tolstoy , russian writer )

zh-CN: 冬天来了，春天还会远吗？(英国诗人,雪莱.P.B.)
en-US: if winter comes , can spring be far behind ? ( p. b. shelley , british poet )

zh-CN: 如果你怀疑自己，那么你的立足点确实不稳固了。(挪威剧作家易卜生)
en-US: if you doubt yourself , then indeed you stand on shaky ground. ( ibsen , norwegian dramatist )

zh-CN: 如果你想走到高处，就要使用自己的两条腿！不要让别人把你抬到高处；不要坐在别人的背上和头上。(德国哲学家尼采.F.W.)
en-US: if you would go up high , then use your own legs ! do not let yourselves carried aloft ; do not seat yourselves on other people's backs and heads. ( f. w. nietzsche , german philosopher )

zh-CN: 就是在我们母亲的膝上，我们获得了我们的最高尚、最真诚和最远大的理想，但是里面很少有任何金钱。(美国作家马克·吐温)
en-US: it is at our mother's knee that we acquire our noblest and truest and highest , but there is seldom any money in them. ( mark twain , american writer )

zh-CN: 生活没有目标就像航海没有指南针。(法国作家大仲马.A.)
en-US: living without an aim is like sailing without a compass. ( alexander dumas , davy de la pailleterie , french writer )

zh-CN: 有些理想曾为我们引过道路，并不断给我新的勇气以欣然面对人生，那些理想就是--真、善、美。(美国科学家爱因斯坦.A.)
en-US: the ideals which have lighted my way , and time after time have given me new courage to face life cheerfully 19 have been kindness , beauty and truth. ( albert einstein , american scientist )

zh-CN: 人生重要的事情就是确定一个伟大的目标，并决心实现它。(德国诗人、戏剧家歌德.J.M.)
en-US: the important thing in life is to have a great aim , and the determination to attain it. ( johan wolfgang von goethe , german poet and dramatist )

zh-CN: 具有新想法的人在其想法实现之前是个怪人。(美国作家马克·吐温)
en-US: the man with a new idea is a crank until the idea succeeds. ( mark twain , american writer )

zh-CN: 实现明天理想的唯一障碍是今天的疑虑。(美国总统罗斯福.F.)
en-US: the only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today. ( franklin roosevelt , american president )

zh-CN: 如果一个目的是正当而必须做的，则达到这个目的的必要手段也是正当而必须采取的。(美国政治家林肯.A.)
en-US: when an end is lawful and obligatory , the indispensable means to is are also lawful and obligatory. ( abraham lincoln , american statesman )

zh-CN: 一个自由的人除了从书本上获取知识外，还可以从许多别的来源获得知识。(美国总统杰斐逊.T.)
en-US: a free man obtains knowledge from many sources 1 besides books . ( thomas jefferson , american president )

zh-CN: 我的大部分知识都是这样获得的：在寻找某个资料时意外的发现了另上的资料。(美国幽默作家富兰克林.A.)
en-US: a great part to the information i have was acquired by looking up something and finding something else on the way. ( adams franklin , american humorist )

zh-CN: 倾已所有追求知识，没有人能夺走它；向知识投资，收益最佳。(美国总统富兰克林.B.)
en-US: if a man empties his purse into his head , no man can take it away from him , an investment in knowledge always pays the best interest. ( benjamin franklin , american president )

zh-CN: 想象力比知识更为重要。(美国科学家爱因斯坦.A.)
en-US: imagination is more important than knowledge . ( albert einstein , american scientist )

zh-CN: 即使所有的专家都一致赞同，他们可能也错了。
en-US: even when the experts all agree , they may well be mistaken .

zh-CN: 有时候你能做的最紧急重要的事情就是彻底休息。
en-US: sometimes the most urgent and vital thing you can possibly do is take a complete rest .

zh-CN: 滴滴小水珠，颗颗小沙粒，会形成浩瀚的海洋与宜人的土地。
en-US: little drops of water , little grains of sand , make the mighty ocean and the pleasant land .

zh-CN: 给他一条鱼，你可以喂他一天；教他钓鱼，他周末就不会再来缠你了。
en-US: give a man a fish , and you feed him for a day. teach a man to fish , and you get rid of him on the weekends .

zh-CN: 真理没有自己特定的时间段。它的时间永远是现在。
en-US: truth has no special time of it's own. its hour is now always .

zh-CN: 满瓶不响，半瓶咣当。(英国剧作家莎士比亚.W.)
en-US: the empty vessels make the greatest sound. ( william shakespeare , british dramatist )

zh-CN: 差不多任何一种处境—无论是好是坏—都受到我们对待处境的态度的影响。(古罗马哲学家西尼加LA)
en-US: almost any situation--- good or bad --- is affected by the attitude we bring to. ( lucius annaus seneca , ancient roman philosopher )

zh-CN: 虽然世界多苦难，但是苦难总是能战胜的(美国作家海伦·凯勒)
en-US: although the world is full of suffering , it is full also of the overcoming of it. ( hellen keller , american writer )

zh-CN: 水果不仅需要阳光，也需要凉夜。寒冷的雨水能使其成熟。人的性格陶冶不仅需要欢乐，也需要考验和困难。(美国作家布莱克H)
en-US: as fruit needs not only sunshine but cold nights and chilling showers to ripen it , so character needs not only joy but trial and difficulty to mellow it. ( hugh black , american writer )

zh-CN: 我可以拿走人的任何东西，但有一样东西不行，这就是在特定环境下选择自己的生活态度的自由。(德国小说家弗兰克L)
en-US: everything can be taken from a man but one thing ; the freedom to choose his attitude in any given set of circumstances. ( leonhard frand , german novelist )

zh-CN: 每场悲剧都会在平凡的人中造就出英雄来。(美国作家斯蒂芬斯N)
en-US: every tragedy makes heroes of common people. ( normna stephens , american writer )

zh-CN: 自己甘愿受辱的人，受污辱也活该。(英国作家科福德FC)
en-US: he who allows himself to be insulted , deserves to be. ( f.c.comford , british writer )

zh-CN: 我发现生活是令人激动的事情，尤其是为别人活着时。(美国作家海伦·凯勒)
en-US: i find life an exciting business and most exciting when it is lived for others. ( helen keller , ameican writer )

zh-CN: 我一生下来就开始哭泣，而每一天都表明我哭泣的原因。(美国小说家杰克·伦敦)
en-US: i wept when i was born , and every day shows why. ( jack london , american novelist )

zh-CN: 如果你想一生摆脱苦难
en-US: if you want to live your whole life free from pain

zh-CN: 手中的一只鸟胜于林中的两只鸟。
en-US: a bird in the hand is worth two in the bush .

zh-CN: 一个人可以把马带到河边，但他不能令它饮水。
en-US: a man may lead a horse to the water , but he cannot make it drink .

zh-CN: 早睡早起使人健康、富裕又聪明。
en-US: early to bed and early to rise , makes a man healthy , wealthy , and wise .

zh-CN: 生活只是由一系列下决心的努力所构成。
en-US: life is just a series of trying to make up your mind .

zh-CN: 人必须相信自己，这是成功的秘诀。
en-US: you have to believe in yourself. that ’ s the secret of success .

zh-CN: 我不缅怀过去的历史，而致力于未来的梦想。
en-US: i like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past .

zh-CN: 我们要尽可能为生活增加一些东西，而不是从中索取什么。
en-US: we are here to add what we can to life , not to get what we can from it .

zh-CN: 没有学院和大学的帮助，人生本身也正在变成一所高等学府。
en-US: life itself , without the assistance of colleges and universities , is becoming an advanced institution of learning .

zh-CN: 工作时工作，玩乐是玩乐，依此方法做，轻松与欢乐。
en-US: work while you work ; play while you play ; this is the way ; to be cheerful and gay .

zh-CN: 若是一生一帆风顺，你怎会勇敢。
en-US: you can't be brave if you ' ve only had wonderful things happen to you

zh-CN: 成功有一个简单的公式：尽力而为，也许有人会喜欢。
en-US: success has a simple formula : do your best , and people may like it

zh-CN: 无事可做的一个缺点是你不能停下来休息。
en-US: one disadvantage of having nothing to do is you can't stop and rest

zh-CN: 真理不是某个人的资产，而是人类共同享有的财富。
en-US: truth is the property of no individual but is the treasure of all men .

zh-CN: 不要只因一次失败，就放弃你原来决心想达到的目的。(英国剧作家莎士比亚.W.)
en-US: do not , for one repulse , give up the purpose that you resolved to effect . ( william shakespeare , british dramatist )

zh-CN: 不要放弃你的幻想。当幻想没有了以后，你还可以生存，但是你虽生犹死。（(美国作家马克·吐温)
en-US: don't part with your illusions . when they are gone you may still exist , but you have ceased to live. ( mark twain , american writer )

zh-CN: 我想揭示大自然的秘密，用来造福人类。
en-US: i want to bring out the secrets of nature and apply them for the happiness of man .

zh-CN: 我认为，在我们的短暂一生中，最好的贡献莫过于此了。(美国发明家爱迪生.T.)
en-US: i don't know of any better service to offer for the short time we are in the world . ( thomas edison , american inventor )

zh-CN: 没有理想，就没有坚定的方向；没有方向，就没有生活。(俄国作家托尔斯泰.L.)
en-US: without ideal , there is no secure direction ; without direction , there is no life . ( leo tolstoy , russian writer )

zh-CN: 冬天来了，春天还会远吗？(英国诗人,雪莱.P.B.)
en-US: if winter comes , can spring be far behind ? ( p. b. shelley , british poet )

zh-CN: 如果你怀疑自己，那么你的立足点确实不稳固了。(挪威剧作家易卜生)
en-US: if you doubt yourself , then indeed you stand on shaky11 ground . ( ibsen , norwegian dramatist )

zh-CN: 如果你想走到高处，就要使用自己的两条腿！
en-US: if you would go up high , then use your own legs !

zh-CN: 不要让别人把你抬到高处；不要坐在别人的背上和头上。(德国哲学家尼采.F.W.)
en-US: do not let yourselves carried aloft ; do not seat yourselves on other people's backs and heads . ( f. w . nietzsche , german philosopher )

zh-CN: 就是在我们母亲的膝上，我们获得了我们的最高尚、最真诚和最远大的理想，但是里面很少有任何金钱。(美国作家马克·吐温)
en-US: it is at our mother's knee that we acquire our noblest and truest and highest , but there is seldom any money in them. ( mark twain , american writer )

zh-CN: 生活没有目标就像航海没有指南针。(法国作家大仲马.A.)
en-US: living without an aim is like sailing without a compass.alexander dumas ( davy de la pailleterie , french writer )

zh-CN: 天才只意味着终身不懈的努力。(俄国化学家门捷列耶夫)
en-US: genius only means hard-working all one's life . ( mendeleyer , russian chemist )

zh-CN: 终身幸福！这是任何活着的人都无法忍受的，那将是人间地狱。(英国剧作家肖伯纳.G.)
en-US: a lifetime of happiness ! no man alive could bear it ; it would be hell on earth . ( g. bernard shaw , british dramatist )

zh-CN: 幸福是勇气的一种形式。(英国作家杰克逊.H.)
en-US: happiness is form courage . ( h. jackson , british writer )

zh-CN: 正像我们无权只享受财富而不创造财富一样，我们也无权只享受幸福而不创造幸福。(英国剧作家肖伯纳.G.)
en-US: we have no more right to consume happiness without producing it than to consume wealth without producing it . ( george bernard shaw , british dramatist )

zh-CN: 快乐是唯一的好事，快乐的时候是现在，快乐的地方是这里，快乐的方法是使他人快乐。
en-US: happiness is the only good. the time to be happy is now. the place to be happy is here. the way to be happy is to make others so .

zh-CN: 批评者知道路但不会开车。
en-US: a critic is a man who knows the way but can ’ t drive the car .

zh-CN: 如果有人问我哪一个建议对人们最有用，那就是：当麻烦出现时，视它为人生不可避免的一部分，把头高高抬起，直视麻烦然后说：『我比你巨大，你无法击倒我。』
en-US: if i were asked to give what i consider the single most useful bit of advice for all humanity , it would be this : expect trouble as an inevitable part of life and when it comes , hold your head high , look it squarely in the eye , and say , ‘ i will be bigger than you . you cannot defeat me .

zh-CN: 快乐的人有生产力，无聊的人大量消费但没什么生产力。
en-US: the happy people are those who are producing something ; the bored people are those who are consuming much and producing nothing .

zh-CN: 记住，你的想法与对自己的描述决定你内在的态度。如果你有一个值得追求的目标，找到你可以达成的理由，而不是几百个达不到的理由。
en-US: remember , the thoughts that you think and the statements you make regarding yourself determine your mental attitude. if you have a worthwhile objective , find the one reason why you can achieve it rather than hundreds of reasons why you can ’ t.

zh-CN: 让自己察觉到周遭事物有多么美好时，我们感受到快乐。
en-US: joy is what happens to us when we allow ourselves to recognize how good things really are .

zh-CN: 批评应该像雨水般，轻柔的滋养一个人的成长，但不伤害其根部。
en-US: criticism , like rain , should be gentle enough to nourish a man ’ s growth without destroying his roots .

zh-CN: 快乐是什么？就是力量增加、克服阻力的感觉。
en-US: what is happiness ? the feeling that power increases , that resistance is overcome .

zh-CN: 借由纠正自己而非别人的毛病，我们通常可以帮助别人更多。
en-US: we can often do more for other men by trying to correct our own faults than by trying to correct theirs .

zh-CN: 有时候，人生中最艰难的事,锻造了最坚强的你。
en-US: sometimes the hardest things in life are what make you the strongest .

zh-CN: 总会有人比你更漂亮，总会有人更聪明，总会有人更年轻，但他们永远都不是你。
en-US: someone will always be prettier . someone will always be smarter . someone will always be younger . but they will never be you .

zh-CN: 如果这个世界上只有欢乐，我们就永远也学不会勇敢和耐心。
en-US: we could never learn to be brave and patient , if there were only joy in the world .

zh-CN: 我们以为爱的很深，很深，来日岁月，会让你知道，它不过很浅，很浅。最深和最重的爱，必须和时日一起成长。
en-US: we all thought love was very deep , but in fact it's very thin . the deepest and heaviest love must grow up with the time .

zh-CN: 不管经历怎样的大悲大喜，我们终究都会死去。
en-US: we shout and scream and wail and cry , but in the end we must all die .

zh-CN: 你已经一无所有，没有什么道理不顺心而为。
en-US: you are already naked . there is no reason not to follow your heart .

zh-CN: 人们总说时间会改变一切，但实际上你自己必须去改变一切。
en-US: they always say that time changes things , but you actually have to change them yourself .

zh-CN: 好心情才会有好风景，好眼光才会有好发现，好思考才会有好主意。
en-US: good mood will have good scenery , good vision will have a good find , good thinking will have a good idea .

zh-CN: 寂寞的人总是记住生命中出现的每一个人，正如我总是意犹未尽地想起你！
en-US: the man always remember , lonely life of every man , as i kept thinking of you !

zh-CN: 很多时候，男人会让你觉得他爱上了你，其实他真没有；而女人会让你觉得她不可能会爱上你，结果她却动了心。
en-US: a boy will make you think he loves you , but he really doesn't . a girl will make you think she doesn't love you , when she really does .

zh-CN: 想你，是一种美丽的忧伤的甜蜜的惆怅，心里面，却是一种用任何语言也无法表达的温馨。
en-US: it is graceful grief and sweet sadness to think of you , but in my heart , there is a kind of soft warmth that can ’ t be expressed with any choice of words .

zh-CN: 人生总是充满遗憾。问问你周围的人他们有没有遗憾的事情，他们会轻而易举的列出一大堆“遗憾清单”。
en-US: life is filled with regrets. ask anyone around you what their regrets are and they usually have no difficulty coming up with many items on their “ regret list 。 ”

zh-CN: 如果一个女生可以忍受你心情不好时的坏脾气，粘着你和你的一大堆缺点，那你就不该放她走。
en-US: if a girl can put up with you through your worst days , and still stick with you and your mistakes , then you shouldn't let her go .

zh-CN: 你是唯一一个能让我各种情绪泛滥的人。
en-US: you're the only one who can bring out all sorts of emotions in me .

zh-CN: 青春不是一段年华，而是一种心境！
en-US: youth is not a time of life , it is a state of mind .

zh-CN: 你应该明白：这个世界对你微笑的人太多，而真心包容你的，太少。
en-US: you should understand that there are too many people in the world smile at you , and sincerely inclusive you , too .

zh-CN: 幸福是多样的，人人都可以拥有自己的幸福，关键在自己的感知和体会。
en-US: happiness is various , everyone can have their own happiness , the key in his own perception and experience .

zh-CN: 别把时间浪费在回首你已经失去的东西上，向前看吧，因为时光本就不会倒流。
en-US: don't waste your time looking back you have lost something , look ahead of time , because this will not flow backwards .

zh-CN: 不要为所能为，不要花尽所有，不要全信所闻，不要言尽所知。
en-US: do not all you can , spend not all you have ; believe not all you hear ; and tell not all youknow .

zh-CN: 爱就是当你坐在他身边，哪怕什么都不做，也会感觉很开心。
en-US: love is when you sit beside someone doing nothing yet you feel perfectly happy .

zh-CN: 一个朋友圈子里每个人都应该是平等的。
en-US: in a group of friends , everyone should be on an equal playing field .

zh-CN: 如果什么都是由着你来决定，随时都要你来管事，或者总是想控制别人的行为，那别人是不会对你有好感的。
en-US: if you ’ re the one always making the decisions , constantly needing to be in charge , or trying to control what others are doing , you ’ re acting in an unattractive way .

zh-CN: 如果你想做一个合格的好朋友或者想受别人的欢迎，那你一定得诚实。
en-US: when it comes to being a great friend , or someone who others want to be around , you need to be honest .

zh-CN: 许多行为不端的人都不够诚实、随时在撒谎，他们到处询问每个问到他们的问题，或者他们对不同事物的真实看法。
en-US: many people who partake in ugly behaviors are often dishonest , lying about everything , inquiring about every question asked about them , and how they truly feel about different things .

zh-CN: 如果你常常没礼貌、冒犯别人或用粗言秽语让朋友难堪，请改改吧。
en-US: if you ’ re the person that ’ s frequently impolite , offensive , or embarrassing your friends with your rude comments in public – quit .

zh-CN: 总有些时候你不赞同某些人，或者是看到你不想看的情景，但是没有必要大闹一场吧。别人只会看到你的粗暴行为，而不能明白你的感受。
en-US: there are going to be times when you don ’ t agree with someone , or see something you didn ’ t want to see , but there ’ s no point in making a scene , because you ’ re making everyone look at your terrible behavior and they ’ re not seeing what you ’ re seeing .

zh-CN: 在和别人相处中，无法值得依靠是一个非常低劣的品质。
en-US: if you ’ re the person no one can count on , that ’ s an unattractive quality in friendships .

zh-CN: 更甚，如果你从没帮助别人，还总是要求他人帮助你，有这种行为的人是没有人愿意和你交朋友的。
en-US: similarly , if you ’ re the one always calling for help from others , yet never offering yours when they need it , that ’ s another unattractive quality that no one wants in a friend .

zh-CN: 如果你总是在贬低或者总是看到事情消极的一面，试着改变你的态度吧。
en-US: if you ’ re constantly putting things down , or seeing situations in a negative light , try and change your attitude .

zh-CN: 没人愿意和这种缺乏正能量的人成为朋友。
en-US: nobody wants to be friends with someone who ’ s constantly seeing the negative instead of the positive .

zh-CN: 想像一个大爆炸，当你在三千多英尺的高空；想像机舱内布满黑烟，想像引擎发出喀啦、喀啦、喀啦、喀啦、喀啦的声响，听起来很可怕。
en-US: imagine a big explosion as you climb through 3,000 ft. imagine a plane full of smoke. imagine anengine going clack , clack , clack , clack , clack , clack , clack. it sounds scary .

zh-CN: 机长把飞机对齐哈德逊河，一般的航道可不是这样。
en-US: the pilot lines up the plane with the hudson river . that's usually not the route .

zh-CN: 然后他说了几个字，我听过最不带情绪的几个字，他说，“即将迫降，小心冲击。”
en-US: and then he says 3 words-the most unemotional 3 words i've ever heard. he says , " brace for impact. "

zh-CN: 我可以在她眼神里看到恐惧，人生结束了。
en-US: i could see in her eyes , it was terror. life was over .

zh-CN: 现在我想和你们分享那天我所学到的三件事。
en-US: now i want to share with you 3 things i learned about myself that day .

zh-CN: 昨日若不弃，明日多烦忧。
en-US: you can ’ t have a better tomorrow if you don ’ t stop thinking about yesterday .

zh-CN: 有时候，爱就像风一样，看不到，却只能用心去感觉！
en-US: sometimes , love is like the wind , can not see , only the heart to feel !

zh-CN: 不管事情变得多坏，在不远的地方，相信总会有一些美好即将来临。
en-US: no matter how bad things get , something good is out there , just over the horizon .

zh-CN: 如果我不这么在乎，生活会简单得多。
en-US: life would be so much simpler if i didn ’ t care so much .

zh-CN: 生命里的每一次创伤都是一种成熟，每一次失去都是一种获得。
en-US: in the ways of life every trauma is a mature , every loss is a gain .

zh-CN: 真正的爱情，不分早到晚到，无关多或者少，是你的，就是你的。
en-US: it doesn't matter the true love comes early or late , much or little. it will be yours if it is meant to be

zh-CN: 记忆是一种相聚的方式，忘却是一种自由的方式。
en-US: remembrance is a form of meeting. forgetfulness is a form of freedom .

zh-CN: 人必须相信自己，那是你成功的秘诀。
en-US: you have to believe in yourself. that is the secret of success .

zh-CN: 中国巡演isRockNRolling，粉丝的表现嗨爆了！3月21日@黑金开放测试，我们到时见！
en-US: my china tour is rock n rolling ! and all my fans are amazing ! black gold will open for test on the 21 st march , see you then !

zh-CN: 谢谢中国的粉丝们！我在这里度过了愉快的时光。希望我能尽快再次回来！
en-US: thank you china ! i had such an amazing time here. i hope i can come back soon !

zh-CN: 现在2014年《Maxim》杂志最性感的100位女星开始投票了！
en-US: voting for the 2014 maxim hot 100 is now open ! ...

zh-CN: 最后一站，深圳！今晚在华润深圳湾体育中心见！
en-US: last stop , shenzhen ! see you all tonight at the china resources shenzhen bay sports center !

zh-CN: 你好！我希望中国的粉丝们冬天要注意保暖！我听说还是很冷！
en-US: ni hao ! i hope my fans in china are keeping warm this winter ! i heard its the coldest yet !

zh-CN: 成都是一个非常漂亮的地方！我希望今晚你们已经准备好见我啦！
en-US: chengdu is such a beautiful place ! i hope you ’ re ready to see me tonight !

zh-CN: 在录制“BadGirl”的时候非常有趣，因为这是我与MarilynManso
en-US: bad girl was a fun track to record because i got to collaborate with marilyn man

zh-CN: 南京，下一站就是你！非常兴奋第一次在这里开唱！
en-US: nanjing , you ’ re next ! i’m excited to perform for you guys for my first time ever !

zh-CN: 现在在我巡演的时候想要把新单曲和音乐录影带组合在一起。这并不容易。
en-US: trying to put together new singles and videos now while im on tour. its not easy

zh-CN: 我登上了《Nouveau》杂志最新一期的封面！
en-US: avril is featured on the cover of the latest nouveau magazine ! !

zh-CN: 我就要来中国进行几周的巡演了。
en-US: the avril lavigne tour is heading to china for a few weeks .

zh-CN: 我得到了最受歌迷喜爱奖的提名！现在去投票吧
en-US: avrils nominated for the juno fan choice award ! get your vote in now

zh-CN: 在美丽的泰国曼谷走着，拾起了地上的花瓣。
en-US: picking up flowers off the ground while walking in beautiful bangkok thailand .

zh-CN: 我想要感谢所有粉丝们对我的爱和支持。
en-US: i wanna thank all my lil black stars for your love and support .

zh-CN: Mugen太棒了！谢谢你们参与我的日本巡演。
en-US: mugen rocks ! thank u for being a part of the avril lavigne tour japan .

zh-CN: 春节快乐！你们今年会如何庆祝春节呢？
en-US: happy chinese new year ! how will you be celebrating your spring festival this year ?

zh-CN: 我的粉丝们表示我们还在RockNRoll！
en-US: my fans are showing em that were still rock n roll !

zh-CN: 这幅拼贴画太漂亮了。感谢我的粉丝们，这实在是太酷了。
en-US: this is such a beautiful collage. thank u to my fans. this is so dope .

zh-CN: 祝我的粉丝们新年快乐，2014年见！非常感谢你们这一年对我的爱。
en-US: happy new year little black stars see you in 2014 ! thanks for all the love this year .

zh-CN: 2014年快乐！希望大家都能度过完满的一年！

zh-CN: 爱情像香水，你不可能洒在别人身上自己却得不到一丝一毫。
en-US: love is a perfume you cannot pour onto others without getting a few drops on yourself .

zh-CN: 真爱就像鬼魂，谈论的人多，见过的人少。
en-US: true love is like ghosts , which everyone talks about and few have seen .

zh-CN: 人人都承认爱情是美好的必须的，然而到底什么是爱从没有定论。
en-US: everyone admits that love is wonderful and necessary , yet no one agrees on just what it is .

zh-CN: 在星星上荡秋千、云中漫步都是什么感觉呢？会像我感觉你在身边的一样吗？
en-US: what would it be like to swing on a star , or walk on a cloud ? would it be anything like what i feel whenever you are near ?

zh-CN: 为了爱情结婚也许有点冒险，但却如此真实，上帝除了微笑也无能为力。
en-US: marrying for love may be a bit risky , but it is so honest that god can't help but smile on it .

zh-CN: 我爱你，不知怎么爱上的你，没原因的爱，没来由的爱……
en-US: i love you without knowing how , why , or even from where...

zh-CN: 我不渴求生命；我首先要爱情，然后顺便活着。
en-US: i don't want to live ; i want to love first , and live incidentally .

zh-CN: 一个人总要走陌生的路，看陌生的风景，听陌生的歌，然后在某个不经意的瞬间，你会发现，原本是费尽心机想要忘记的事情真的就那么忘记了。
en-US: one is always on a strange road , watching strange scenery and listening to strange music . then one day , you will find that the things you try hard to forget are already gone .

zh-CN: 幸福，不是长生不老，不是大鱼大肉，不是权倾朝野。
en-US: happiness is not about being immortal nor having food or rights in one's hand .

zh-CN: 幸福是每一个微小的生活愿望达成。当你想吃的时候有得吃，想被爱的时候有人来爱你。
en-US: it ’ s about having each tiny wish come true , or having something to eat when you are hungry or having someone's love when you need love .

zh-CN: 爱情是灯，友情是影子，当灯灭了，你会发现你的周围都是影子。朋友，是在最后可以给你力量的人。
en-US: love is a lamp , while friendship is the shadow . when the lamp is off , you will find the shadow everywhere. friend is who can give you strength at last .

zh-CN: 举得起放得下的叫举重，举得起放不下的叫负重。
en-US: if you can hold something up and put it down , it is called weight-lifting ; if you can hold something up but can never put it down , it's called burden-bearing .

zh-CN: 可惜，大多数人的爱情，都是负重的。
en-US: pitifully , most of people are bearing heavy burdens when they are in love .

zh-CN: 我们每个人都生活在各自的过去中，人们会用一分钟的时间去认识一个人，用一小时的时间去喜欢一个人，再用一天的时间去爱上一个人，到最后呢，却要用一辈子的时间去忘记一个人。
en-US: we all live in the past. we take a minute to know someone , one hour to like someone , and one day to love someone , but the whole life to forget someone .

zh-CN: 一个人一生可以爱上很多的人，等你获得真正属于你的幸福之后，你就会明白一起的伤痛其实是一种财富，它让你学会更好地去把握和珍惜你爱的人。
en-US: one may fall in love with many people during the lifetime . when youfinally get your own happiness , you will understand the previoussadness is kind of treasure , which makes you better to hold and cherish the people you love .

zh-CN: 年轻的时候会想要谈很多次恋爱，但是随着年龄的增长，终于领悟到爱一个人，就算用一辈子的时间，还是会嫌不够。
en-US: when you are young , you may want several love experiences. but as time goes on , you will realize that if you really love someone , the whole life will not be enough .

zh-CN: 慢慢地去了解这个人，体谅这个人，直到爱上为止，是需要有非常宽大的胸襟才行。
en-US: you need time to know , to forgive and to love.all this needs a very big mind .

zh-CN: 当明天变成了今天成为了昨天，最后成为记忆里不再重要的某一天，我们突然发现自己在不知不觉中已被时间推着向前走，这不是静止火车里，与相邻列车交错时，仿佛自己在前进的错觉，而是我们真实的在成长，在这件事里成了另一个自己。
en-US: when tomorrow turns in today , yesterday , and someday that no more important in your memory , we suddenly realize that we r pushed forward by time. this is not a train in still in which you may feel forward when another train goes by . it is the truth that we ' ve all grown up. and we become different .

zh-CN: 离开我就别安慰我，要知道每一次缝补也会遭遇穿刺的痛。
en-US: if you leave me , please don't comfort me because each sewing has to meet stinging pain .

zh-CN: 曾经拥有的，不要忘记。不能得到的，更要珍惜。属于自己的，不要放弃。已经失去的，留作回忆。
en-US: don ’ t forget the things you once you owned . treasure the things you can ’ t get . don't give up the things that belong to you and keep those lost things in memory .

zh-CN: 我喜欢并习惯了对变化的东西保持着距离，这样才会知道什么是最不会被时间抛弃的准则。比如爱一个人，充满变数，我于是后退一步，静静的看着，直到看见真诚的感情。
en-US: i love and am used to keeping a distance with those changed things.only in this way can i know what will not be abandoned by time. for example , when you love someone , changes are all around. then i step backward and watching it silently , then i see the true feelings .

zh-CN: 好的爱情是你通过一个人看到整个世界，坏的爱情是你为了一个人舍弃世界。
en-US: good love makes you see the whole world from one person while bad love makes you abandon the whole world for one person .

zh-CN: 在自己面前，应该一直留有一个地方，独自留在那里。然后去爱。
en-US: we shall always save a place for ourselves , only for ourselves. and then begin to love .

zh-CN: 不知道是什么，不知道是谁，不知道如何去爱，也不知道可以爱多久。
en-US: have no idea of what it is , who he is , how to love or how long it will be. just wait for one love .

zh-CN: 只是等待一次爱情，也许永远都没有人。可是，这种等待，就是爱情本身。
en-US: maybe no one will come out , but this kind of waiting is the love itself

zh-CN: 有谁不曾为那暗恋而痛苦?我们总以为那份痴情很重，很重，是世上最重的重量。有一天，暮然回首，我们才发现，它一直都是很轻，很轻的。我们以为爱的很深，很深，来日岁月，会让你知道，它不过很浅，很浅。最深和最重的爱，必须和时日一起成长。
en-US: is there anyone who hasn't suffered for the secret love ? we always think that love is very heavy , heavy and could be the heaviest thing in the world . but one day , when you look back , you suddenly realize that it's always light , light . we all thought love was very deep , but in fact it's very thin . the deepest and heaviest love must grow up with the time .

zh-CN: 在这个世界上，只有真正快乐的男人，才能带给女人真正的快乐。
en-US: in this world , only those men who really feel happy can give women happiness .

zh-CN: 一段不被接受的爱情，需要的不是伤心，而是时间，一段可以用来遗忘的时间。一颗被深深伤了的心，需要的不是同情，而是明白。
en-US: an unacceptable love needs no sorrow but time- sometime for forgetting.a badly-hurt heart needs no sympathy but understanding .

zh-CN: 我知道这世上有人在等我，尽管我不知道我在等谁。但是因为这样，我每天都非常快乐。
en-US: i know someone in the world is waiting for me , although i've no idea of who he is. but i feel happy every day for this .

zh-CN: 一生至少该有一次，为了某个人而忘了自己，不求有结果，不求同行，不求曾经拥有，甚至不求你爱我。只求在我最美的年华里，遇到你。
en-US: in your life , there will at least one time that you forget yourself for someone , asking for no result , no company , no ownership nor love. just sk for meeting you in my most beautiful years .

zh-CN: 我不觉得人的心智成熟是越来越宽容涵盖，什么都可以接受。
en-US: i don't think that when people grow up , they will become more broad-minded and can accept everything .

zh-CN: 相反，我觉得那应该是一个逐渐剔除的过程，知道自己最重要的是什么，知道不重要的东西是什么。而后，做一个纯简的人。
en-US: conversely , i think it's aselecting process , knowing what's the most important and what's the least. and then be a simple man .

zh-CN: 当你的心真的在痛，眼泪快要流下来的时候，那就赶快抬头看看，这片曾经属于我们的天空;当天依旧是那么的广阔，云依旧那么的潇洒，那就不应该哭，因为我的离去，并没有带走你的世界。
en-US: when you feel hurt and your tears are gonna to drop. please look up and have a look at the sky once belongs to us. if the sky is still vast , clouds are still clear , you shall not cry because my leave doesn't take away the world that belongs to you .

zh-CN: 当某人出现在你的梦里，意味着那个人在想你
en-US: when someone appears in your dreams , it means that person misses you .

zh-CN: 编剧--我想把这个故事改编成个小电影。我们需要剧本。
en-US: screenwriters -- i'm thinking of adapting this story into a short film . we need a script .

zh-CN: 有两件东西教益于人的整个本性,一是本能,一是经验
en-US: two things instruct man about his whole nature ; instinct and experience .

zh-CN: 下周在旧金山将举行2012年英特尔信息技术峰会（IDF），我们将与数以千计的参会者欢庆技术创新，分享我们的最新进展和英特尔的愿景。在北京的2012年春季IDF上，我曾经发表了主题演讲，那是一个激动人心的时刻。让我们再次回到IDF，看看又有哪些新内容
en-US: next week is the intel developer forum ( idf ) 2012 in sf where we'll celebrate technological innovation , share our latest advances and intel's vision with thousands of attendees. i had a great time delivering the keynote at idf 2012 in beijing. check back here for updates .

zh-CN: 新编者将从18世纪原文中删除不清楚的地方。
en-US: the new editor will rid the 18th-century text of its cobwebs .

zh-CN: 我在德州休斯顿的布什机场，这里有比真人还大的我父亲的雕像，以及有关他生活的照片。其中一张是1964年我们的家庭合影，另一张是他75岁时跳伞的照片。我在哪儿都碰到家人
en-US: i'm at the bush airport in houston , texas where my father has a bigger than life statue and photos showing parts of his life. one is of our family in 1964 , the other is my father parachuting on his 75 th birthday. i keep running into family everywhere !

zh-CN: 触控、语音控制、脸部识别和手势指令，正在融入日常的个人计算之中。这是革命性的技术，并且关乎最佳的体验以及与特定设备的互动——我看很酷
en-US: touch , voice control , facial recognition & gesture commands are already making their way into everyday personal computing. it's revolutionary , and about the best experience and interaction with a particular device . cool stuff .

zh-CN: 人们仍然以嘲讽和轻蔑的语气对待那些竟然不读色诺芬希腊语原著的人，或是那些不读维吉尔拉丁语原著的人。
en-US: a tone of sarcastic contempt is maintained towards the person who shall presume to peruse xenophon not in the original greek , or virgil not in the original latin .

zh-CN: 有时你要学会放手，这样生命中才有足够空间迎接将要来临的美好。
en-US: sometimes you have to let things go ， then there’s room for better things to come into your life .

zh-CN: 确保所有测试规范都以相同的格式编写和显示,以缩短规范的审查时间
en-US: ensure all test specifications are written and displayed in the same format , shortening spec review time .

zh-CN: 明天晚上，我会在JayLeno的节目中表演，并且接受采访。
en-US: tomorrow night , i will be on jay leno for a performance and interview .

zh-CN: 大家好！我们Mroon5正在Charitybuzz网站上拍卖一些物品，以帮助我们...http://t.cn/zW0rOB5
en-US: hey guys. auctioning some sweet m5 items charitybuzz to benefit our friend zoefeldman . you can bid here http : //t.cn/zw0robq

zh-CN: 哈比人历险记拍得真好,感谢杰克琼斯请我们去看，那么多媒体朋友在一起看电影的感觉好爽！大家喜欢哈比人历险记还是魔戒呢
en-US: the hobbit is really well shot , thanks to jack and jones for inviting us to watch it , you guys like the hobbit or lord of the rings better ?

zh-CN: 我努力充实地生活，这样，当我背运时，我就不会后悔，也不会因为虚度时光而自责。
en-US: i try to live fully so that when luck changes there will be little room for regret or recrimination over time lost or misspent .

zh-CN: 对AndersonCooper说，他犯难了。因为真的没有人能够解释这些如此无知冷血的评论，减少人们的反感
en-US: to anderson cooper , he's stumped . because there's literally no way to put a positive spin on such incredibly ignorant and insensitive comments .

zh-CN: 只要一个人还有追求，他就没有老。直到后悔取代了梦想，一个人才算老。
en-US: a man is not old as long as he is seeking something. a man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams in his heart .

zh-CN: 正在等咖啡发挥效应...在片场睡觉
